113b7: byang chub ched du yongs su bsngol mkhas pa ste// de phyir dge bkun la smos pa yod min zhing // zla banya ba'i zla ba mkha' la skar ma yi// tshogs kyi dbus na gnas pa rnam par mdzes pa dag/ yang dang yang du dge ba kun la rnam 'phel
113b8: 'gyur/ lha'i dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na shes rab dag la rgya mtsho la bu rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhen/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang / sgrub pa snying por byed pa dang / blorab tu gnas pad
114a1: ya/ / lhag pa'i bsam pa rje ltar brtan pa ste/ ngas bzhi pa de dag dang // de la 'dag ces bya ste// mkhas pa de dag jisad smras pa de bzhin byed// de dag sgrub pa steng par byed cing bla ba gnas// gang dag btsun pa da dag rje
114a2: rdza lta bu yi/ / lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa dag dang ldan par 'gyur// mkhas pa gang dag chos bzhi de dag ston byed pa// de dag rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten byed cing // dam bcas rnams la snying por byed par 'gyur ba dang // ga
114a3: tu sangs rgyas gsung yang 'dzin par byed pa yin/ / lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na chos la dbang sgyur bas dbang phyug tu gyur pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ye shes kyi stobs can rnams
114a4: yin zhing nyon mongs pa'i stobs can rnams ma yin pa dang / sems la dbang sgyur ba rnams yin zhing bdud kyis dbang sgyur ba ma yin pa dang / gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin pa dang / 'bras bu yod par chos ston pa
114a5: rnams yin te/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de dag ye shes stobs ldan nyon mongs dbang mi 'gro// shes rab stobs kyis blun spangs lha rnams kun dang bral// sems la dbang sgyur byed cing bdud bzhi spangs gyur//
114a6: la// spobs pa brtan par gyur cing gzengs kyis 'khrugs pa med// de dag ston pa 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur te// de phyir myur du dbang phyug nyid dang ldan par 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang
114a7: ldanan bya ba thams cad la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ nga rgyal med pa dang / tha ma la gus pa dang / bag yod pa dang / 'dun pa drag poste// chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dmyal med cing tha mar
114a8: gus pas gnas gyur la/ / kun nas bag yod byang chub mchog la 'dun drag cing // bsam pa thag pas smon cing rtag tu drang gyur la// slob dpon dpe mkhyud med pa rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur// mkhas pa 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i
114b1: don mkhas shing / / tshul dang tshul ma yin pa'i mkhas pa'i brtan pa rnams// 'jig rten kun mdza' thams cad rtogs par khong du chud// de phyir 'gro bas spyi bor thal sbyar de la 'dud// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
114b2: bzhi dang ldan na thams cad du lan mtho ba med cing yon tan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rtse ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa'i spobs pa dang /
114b3: dge ba thams cad dang mi 'bral zhing bag chags dang bral ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan zhing dbang skar ba thob pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sems can dag pa rgya chen mngon shes shes pas u0f7f//
114b4: bde gshegs kun gyis dgongs pa mkha' 'dra'i spobs dang ldan// brtson 'grus thogs med mi dge bag chags kun spangs shing // dge dang ldan zhing dbang srur thob par gyur pa ste// chos rnams de dag la ni rab tu gnas gyur pa// deng /
114b5: kha nam po med pa'i yon tan ldan// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa bsgrub pa 'di bstan pa na lha dang mi rnams las srog chags sa nyis 'bum gyis tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub
114b6: sems dpa' nyi khri lnga stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags 'bum ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// stong gsum gyi
114b7: stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing 'jig rten thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par yang gyur to/ / lha rnams kyis kyang lha'i me tog gi char rab tu phab cing lha'i sil snyan dag gi sgra yang phyung
114b8: bar gyur to/ / klu rnams kyis kyang mu tig dmar po dang / klu'i me tog gi char rab tu phab po// lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la lha'i mchod pa dag
115a1: gas mchod pa byas/ / thams cad dang ldan pa' 'khor rnams kyis kyang mal la chog/ al la chos// sa la la chos shes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod nas mchod pa chen po dag kyang byas so// de nas ldar/
115a2: bra tsal sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'dis de ces smras so// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das kyis chos sum bcucu gnyis po de dag gi don dang tshig rnam par gtan ma pa pa bstan par bka' stsal gyis/
115a3: 'jam dpal khyod kyang chos sum bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag gi don dang tshig rnam par gtan la 'bab pa de la spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dringam
115a4: 'jog pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams gzhan gyi rkyen gyis mi 'gro ba de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gzhan
115a5: gyis dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtsam pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi
115a6: tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams nyon mongs pa thams cad nges par 'joms par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtsam pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa rnams yin no/ /
115a7: lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
115a8: chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings mi g.yo ba rjes su rtogs pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams ngag gis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na
115b1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyi chags pa med par spyod pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yul thams cad la chags pa
115b2: mi byed pa de stan lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyi chags pa med par spyod pa rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi mun
115b3: pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lci'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag par shes par byed pa/ de lta na lha'i bya byang chub sems
115b4: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi mun pa dang bral ba rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor rnams kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/
115b5: 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad rnam par phyen mi rnyed par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor rnams
115b6: kyi nang du bajigs pa dang bral ba rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam thos pas don la rton pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byad
115b7: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad brjod du med par shes par byed pa de stan lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa thos pas don la ston pa rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa'adas/
115b8: dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis chos la ston pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi
116a1: dbyings zhi ba nyid du shes par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis chos la ston pa rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub
116a2: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sgra
116a3: thams cad la brten par mi byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang
116a4: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams la chos smra ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams smra ba thams cad las ldog par byed pa de lta
116a5: na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams la chos smra ba rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon
116a6: par 'phags pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi cha byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad las g.yo bar mi byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
116a7: mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus sbas pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad kyis thub par dka' ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal
116a8: gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams stong pa nyid rjes su rtogs par bya ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa nyid byang chub yin par yongs su tshol bar byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
116b1: sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad kyis thub pa dad / 'ab rnams yinan// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal jisbyar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa thos gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis sram
116b2: pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis gting rtogs par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blos gting dpag dka' ba rnams
116b3: yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems
116b4: dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten na spyod kyang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur ba de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus sbas
116b5: pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gting dpag dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bdag la
116b6: bdag med pas sbrid lug par mi 'gyur ba de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gting dpag dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
116b7: sems dpa' chen po chos ston pas dbang po la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dbang po drug gis dbang po thams cad la lta bar byed par
116b8: lhan lta bya byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston pas dbang po la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas dang ma 'dres pas
117a1: rnam par thar pa'i sgor gnas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bug gin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sgo thams cad nas thar pa ston par byad pa de stan lha'i bu byang chub
117a2: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus mabyas dang ma 'dres pas rnam par thar pa'i sgor gnas pa rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar nabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i da thal /
117a3: tshar gcad pa'i phyir snrel zhing bsgrub pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'khor ba las mya ngan las 'das pa tshol zhing blta bar byed la/
117a4: ngan las 'das pa las kyang 'khor ba tshol zhing blta bar byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i nga rgyal can tshar gcod pa'i phyir snrel zhing bsgrub pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus
117a5: smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyi bya ba thams cad kyi rgyu la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
117a6: rnams chos thams cad mi 'pho bar lta bar byedapade lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyi bya ba thams cad kyi rgyu la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sem
117a7: dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams
117a8: cad bdag po med par shes par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal je
117b1: lta na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dag la thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
117b2: rnams 'jig rten gyi tshul la smod par mi byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dag la thabs mkhas pa rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar
117b3: nabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa yongs su dag pas brtul zhugs grub pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rtogs pa nyid
117b4: byang chub yin par shes par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa yongs su dag pas brtul zhugs grub pa rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems
117b5: dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe 'gras pa'i sems med cing bzod pa stobs dang ldan pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad gtan du yongs
117b6: su mya ngan las 'das par shes par byed/ lta bar byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe 'gras pa'i sems med cing bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji
117b7: ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad
117b8: pha rol las mthong bar byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
118a1: dpa' chen pa sams can thams cad bya bar 'tsha ba rnams yin 'dam dpal gyis smras pa/ bya'i bragang gin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' can pa rnams cas kya byangs ma zad par ga tugs pa cu
118a2: de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad
118a3: bangon par 'dra bar 'gyur ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mi snang ba'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na sdang ba de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems
118a4: dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'dra bar 'gyur ba rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog chags thams cad kyis
118a5: bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos 'ga' yang len par mi byed/ spong bar mi byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
118a6: sems dpa' chen po srog chags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la smras pa med pa rnams
118a7: yen/ jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing 'dra bar shes pa de ltan lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen//
118a8: so ge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la smras pa med pa rnams yin no// lha'i bras smras pa/ 'dam dpal di ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab dag la snying per phur pa rnams yid/ 'jam dpal gyis sram
118b1: sku'i bugang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi byings kun tu byed par mi byed pa de sta na lha'i babyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan pa shesang bdag la snying po thung ba rnams pa na/ lnga'i bus spras pa/
118b2: 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la dbang skar bas dbang thug tu gyur pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i thagang gi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
118b3: dpa' chen po rnams bsam du med pa sems pas sems thams cad shes par byed pa de ltan lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la dbang srung bas dbang thug tu gyur pa rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras
118b4: pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ba thams cad la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
118b5: t shul gcig gis tshul thams cad shes par byed cing tshul thams cad kyis kyang tshul gcig shes par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ba thams cad la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams
118b6: yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang
118b7: gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad gnyen po med par rtogs nas chos 'ga' yang sgrub par mi byed/ chos 'ga' yang sel bar mi byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
118b8: dpa' chen po thams cad du kha na ma thob med cing yon tan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa rnams yin no/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' lnga khri brgyad stong gis ma
119a1: skye ba'i chos lung bstan pa la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu bdun khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// srog chags
119a2: 'bum lhag tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod pa'i phyir lha rnams kyis kyang steng gi bar snang las lha'i me tog gi char dag mngon
119a3: par rab tu phab bo/ / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di thos nas yid rangs pa dang / dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag gis kyang
119a4: chos de dag thob par gyur cig/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spobs pa ji lta ba de lta bu'i spobs pa mi chod pa yang thob par gyur cig ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'jam
119a5: dpal khyod kyis chos rnam par gtan la dbab pa bstan pa 'di legs par smras te legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin to/ / / bam po gnyis pa/ de nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis
119a6: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'jam dpal ci khyod kho bo las chos kyi dga' ba 'dod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di skad du khyod chos kyi dga' pa 'dod dam zhes zer ba ni lha'i bu legs
119a7: bar gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la chos kyi dga' ba zhes bya ba ni srid pa dang 'dod pa spangs pa yin te/ chos 'di ni so sor rtog pa med pa'i phyir 'dod pa med pa yin no// chos 'di ni mig gi lam las yang dag par 'das
119a8: pa'i phyir ltar mi snang ba yin no/ / chos 'di ni mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir ma byas pa yin no// chos 'di ni yul drug dang ma 'dres pa'i phyir mi mthong ba yin no// chos 'di ni sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'i/
119b1: phyir bdag gi ba med pa yin no// chos 'di ni gtan yongs su ma grub pa'i phyir gzung ba med pa yin no// chos 'di ni yul med pa'i yul du 'gro ba'i phyir gzhi med pa yin no// chos 'di ni rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir zag pa
119b2: med pa yin no/ / chos 'di ni sngon gyi mtha' rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'ong ba med pa yin no// chos 'di ni phyi ma'i mtha' rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'gro ba med pa yin no// chos 'di ni da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa'i phyir gnas pa
119b3: med pa yin no/ / chos 'di ni rtag cing sel ba dang bral ba'i phyir rtsol ba med pa yin no// chos 'di ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir mnyam pa med pa yin no// chos 'di ni gnyen po med pa'i phyir mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/
119b4: med pa yin no// chos 'di ni bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir g.yo ba med pa dang / rlom sems med pa dang / ma rtags pa dang / rnam par ma brtags pa dang / rnam par ma bsgrubs pa dang / kun tu
119b5: ma bstan pa yin no/ / chos 'di ni skye ba dang 'jig pa dang bral ba'i phyir blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa yin no// chos 'di ni chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par gzhol ba'i phyir gnas pa med par gnas pa yin no// chos
119b6: 'di ni yang dag par ma byung ba'i phyir dbyer med pa yin no/ / chos 'di ni spros pa dang bral ba'i phyir rab tu spyod pa med pa yin no// chos 'di ni rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi ba'i phyir spros pa dang bral ba yin no// chos 'di ni rnam
119b7: par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir nye bar zhi ba yin no/ / chos 'di ni phas kyis rgol ba thams cad nges par bcom pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa med pa yin no// chos 'di ni 'dod chags kyi rdul dang bral ba'i phyir
119b8: shin tu 'phags pa yin no/ / chos 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi phyir stong pa med pa yin no// chos 'di ni nges par ma rtags pa'i phyir mtshan ma med pa yin no// chos 'di ni rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa'i phyir smon pa medapa
120a1: yin no/ / chos 'di ni rtsa ba yongs su chad pa'i phyir mi gnas pa yin no// chos 'di ni grogs med pa'i phyir mi rten pa yin no// chos 'di ni mi brten pa'i phyir mi g.yo ba yin no// chos 'di ni bzod ma nas
120a2: rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag med pa yin no/ / chos 'di ni gtan mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir sems can med pa yin no// chos 'di ni bzod ma nas ma byung ba'i phyir rtag pa med pa yin no// chos 'di ni bzod ma nas ma
120a3: skyes pa'i phyir ma byung ba yin no/ / chos 'di ni mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir ma skyes pa yin no// chos 'di ni mtshan nyid thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir mtshan nyid med pa yin no// chos 'di ni bzod ma nas yang dag par rgyun chad
120a4: pa'i phyir zhi ba yin no/ / chos 'di ni bzod ma nas nye bar zhi ba'i phyir yang dag pa rgyun chad pa med pa yin no// chos 'di ni mi phyed pa dang mi snang ba'i phyir nam mkha'i mtshan nyid lta bu yin na/ lha'i bu chos de lta bu la chos kyi dga' ba
120a5: ji lta bu zhig yod/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos 'di'i dga' ba ni kun tu 'phro ba med pa yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu legs so legs so// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ chos 'di'i dga' ba ni gang la
120a6: lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyis rtul ba med pa de lta bu yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos 'di ni gsal ba rnyog pa med pa yin pas de ni sems rnyog pa can gyis mchod par mi nus pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/
120a7: ji ltar na sems rnyog pa can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gzugs kyi mtshan ma rjes su dran pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran par byed pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// sgra dang / skad dang / dbyangs dang / tshig
120a8: gi lam gyis chos rjes su dran par byed pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ / 'bras bu thob pa mngon du byed pas dge 'dun rjes su dran par byed pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// nyon mongs pa gtan
120b1: spong ba rjes su dran par byed pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ / skye ba la brten pas lha rjes su dran par byed pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// ma dul ba'i sbyin pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// ma zhi
120b2: ba'i tshul khrims kyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ / sems can la brten pa'i bzod pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// spros pa dang bcas pa'i shes rab kyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// bdag tu 'dzin
120b3: pa la gnas pa'i bams pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ / sems la nges par ma bsams pa'i bsam gtan gyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// the tsom gyi snying rje'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// mya
120b4: ngan las 'das pa'i lam dang bral ba'i dga' ba'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ / gnyis pa la gnas pa'i btang snyoms kyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// lus su 'du shes pa'i tshor ba'i sems ni sems
120b5: rnyog pa can yin no/ / chos su 'du shes pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// skye ba dang 'jig par 'du shes pa'i yang dag pa'i spong ba'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// lus dang sems
120b6: la brten pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ / dbang po drug la brten pa'i dbang po lnga'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// lta ba'i stobs dang ldan pa'i stobs lnga'i sems ni sems rnyog
120b7: pa can yin no/ / chos su 'du shes pa la gnas pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag gi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// 'du byed yid la byed pa la brtson pa'i lam bsgom pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// sdug
120b8: bsngal la yongs su rtog pa'i 'du shes can gyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ / kun 'byung ba la bsgom pa'i 'du shes can gyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// 'gog par zad par 'du shes pa'i sems ni
121a1: sems rnyog pa can yin no/ / lam la bsgom par 'du shes pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin to// lha'i bu deHma du rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa nyid la sgo 'dogs par byed pa de tsam du sems
121a2: rnyog pa can yin no/ / lha'i bris spras pa/ 'jam dpal sems rnyog pa med pa gang dag yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag sems nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dag go// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal rnamam
121a3: la sems cung zad kyang yod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu ji ltar nam mkha' la sems med pa bzhin du sems de yang de dang 'dra ste/ gang gi sems de 'dra ba de na sems nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin no// lha'i
121a4: bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gnas de la su zhig mos par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu lhag par byed pa la brtson pa rnams kyis mos par dka' ba yin no//
121a5: lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal lhag par byed pa zhes bya ba de ji lta bu yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang sems nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir lhag par byed pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci zhig lhag par/
121a6: byed pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu rtag par byed pa ni lhag par byed pa yin no// mi rtag par byed pa ni lhag par byed pa yin no// de bzhin du bde ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / bdag dang bdag
121a7: med par byed pa ni lhag par byed pa yin no/ / stong pa zhes bya ba dang / gang zag ces bya ba de ni lhag par byed pa yin no// mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya ba de ni lhag par byed pa yin no// sgyu ma dang / rmi lam
121a8: dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / brag cha dang / rba zla dang / smig rgyu dang / sprul pa'i ngepe nye bar dgod pa dag gis chos rnam par 'jog par byed/ mtshon par byed/ 'jug par byed/ ston par byed pa de ni lhag par byed pa yin no//
121b1: de tsam du chos rnam par 'dog par byed pa de tsam du lhag par byed pa yin te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa la ston dbyed pa dang / rnam par byed pa la sngon med par byed pa de ni lhag par byed pa yin no// 'khor ba la ston pa
121b2: byed pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la phan yon du lta bar byed pa de ni lhag par byed pa yin te/ lha'i bu de dag ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams kyi lhag par byed pa dag yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na
121b3: lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gis nges par 'byung ba'i dbyings rtogs shing nyon mongs pa thams cad 'gog pa bsgrubs te gnas kyang 'gog pa 'gog par yang mi byed la/ skye ba med//
121b4: ba bskyed par yang mi byed cing / sgra thams cad kyis skrag par yang mi byed la/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de nyid rnam par byang ba'i rang bzhin yin pa de ltar shes shing chos thams cad la gnyis dang bral ba/
121b5: dang / blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa thob pa de ni lha'i bu lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu nyi khri nyis stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba
121b6: rnam par dag go/ dge slong lnga stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri nyis stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog chags stong phrag rab tu mang po
121b7: dag gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / dge bsnyen stong yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba las bud med nyis sdod
121b8: yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ de nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag kyang the tsom ci yod pa dag 'jam
122a1: dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la dris shig/ de nas gnas btan 'od srung chen pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// jam dpal dge slong rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan
122a2: byed pa ji zhig la bsam gtan byed pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po dge slong rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa ni rtsa ba med pa dang / mtha' med pa dang / gnas med pa la bsam
122a3: gtan byed pa dang / mi 'khrugs pa la bsam gtan byed pa dang / yang dag pa la bsam gtan byed pa yin no// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci las bsam ste/ de skad smra/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa
122a4: 'od srung chen po rtsa ba ni rang gi lus yin/ / mtha' ni ngar 'dzin pa yin// gnas ni khams gsum pa yin/ 'khrugs pa ni nyon mongs pa rnams yin// mi mnyam pa ni gnyis yin te/ de la des lus ni rtsa ba med par shes/ ngar
122a5: 'dzin pa ni mtha' med par shes/ khams gsum ni gnas med par shes/ nyon mongs pa rnams ni mi 'khrugs par shes/ bsam gtan rnams ni gnyis su med par shes pas na/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po kho bos de las
122a6: bsam nas dge slong rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa ni rtsa ba med pa dang / mtha' med pa dang / gnas med pa la bsam gtan byed pa dang / mi 'khrugs pa la bsam gtan byed pa dang / yang dag pa la bsam gtan byed pa yin/
122a7: no// zhes smras so// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chags pa thams cad la
122a8: spyod par byed kyang chags pa thams cad kyis gos par mi 'gyur zhing / nyon mongs pa thams cad la mngon sum du byed kyang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa de dag gi rang bzhin gang yin pa'i nyon mongs
122b1: pa de dag kyang spong bar ma byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa yin no// maud gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che ba yin/ 'jam dpal
122b2: gyis smras pa/ btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po byang chub sems dpa' gang 'dus byas kyang mtho ba// 'dus ma byas kyang mthob la slob pa dang mi slob pa rnams kyang 'dul bar byed na de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che
122b3: ba yin no/ / rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad
122b4: sgrib pa med par shes par byed la/ pha rol dang tshu rol dang bral bar byed cing byang chub kyi sgrib pa yang mi spong la ting nge 'dzin las kyang mi ldang zhing / bya ba thams cad ston par byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa'
122b5: nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa yin no/ / byams pa'i bu gang pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa gang po gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dbang
122b6: po thams cad kyis spobs par byed cing 'du byed thams cad mi rtog go/ / zhes 'bras bu yod par chos ston par byed la/ bskal pa stong phrag rnams su don dang / tshig dang / yi ge ston pa rnams kyis rgyas par ston par byed kyang
122b7: mthar thug par mi 'gyur na de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' chos ston pa yin no/ / nam grus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa nam gru gang gi
122b8: byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mnyam par bzhag pa nyid yin par yang shes par byed la sems rnam par g.yengs pa rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed de/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bar du
123a1: spyod par byed cing bsam gtan la gnas pa las gal bar mi 'gyur nang tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan pa yin no/ / nye bar 'khor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub serba/
123a2: dpa' 'dul ba 'dzin pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa nye bar 'khor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams gtan dul ba nyid du yang shes par byed cing ltung ba dang nyon mongs pa dang bral la/ ltung ba
123a3: dang nyon mongs pa gdul ba'i phyir chos ston par byed cing / de ltar nyon mongs rnams rtogs par yang byed la byang chub kyang tshol bar byed na de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba 'dzin pa yin no// ma 'gags pas
123a4: smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lha'i mig dang ldan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa ma 'gags pa gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i gzugs snang ba thams cad kyang mthong /
123a5: bar byed la/ gzugs dben par mthong bas chos thams cad dben par mthong ba rjes su rtogs par byed na de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' lha'i mig dang ldan pa yin no// bu ku las smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang
123a6: chub sems dpa' dbang po bsrungs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yul thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yul yin par blta zhing sangs rgyas kyi yul yang med par blta na de tsam gyis na byang
123a7: chub sems dpa' dbang po bsrungs pa yin no/ / sor mo'i phreng bas smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbang po rno ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byang chub rang
123a8: bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir mtshams med pa dang mnyam par blta bar byed na de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' dbang po rno ba yin no/ / ka t+yA'i bu chen pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mdo
123b1: sa rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa ka d+hA'i bya chen po gang gi ma byang chub sems dpa' sa so yang dag par rig pa me zad pa pan thob cing / tshigacig gis kyang bskal ba 'bum gyi bar/
123b2: du rgya cher rnam par 'byed cing ston la/ ci nas kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa spong bar mi byed pa dang / rnam par byang ba len par mi byed pa de ltar ston par byed pa dang / chos nyid gnas pa las mi g.yol gnas thams cad la
123b3: yang mi rten pa de ltar ston par byed na de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' mdo sde rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yin no/ / gsum po che chen pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' so so yang dag par
123b4: rig pa thob pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i don gyis don so so yang dag par rig pa ston pa dang / chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyis chos so so yang dag par rig pa
123b5: ston pa dang / ming dang mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ston pa dang / brag cha dang mnyam pa nyid kyis spobs pa so so yang dag par rig par ston par byed na de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa'
123b6: so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa yin no/ / sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin gang gi tshe byang chub
123b7: s ems dpa' tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs yang dag par blangs shing sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir tshul khrims 'chal ba'i 'gro ba gang yin par 'gro bar byed na de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' tshul
123b8: khrims dang ldan pa yin no/ / kun dga' bos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas
124a1: thams cad kyis gsungs pa nyan par byed cing thos pa thams cad kyi don kyang rtogs par byed la/ ji ltar thos pa yang 'dzin par byed cing / ji ltar gzung ba bzhin ston par yang byed na de tsam gyis na byang
124a2: chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa yin no/ / de nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad bstan pa de lta bu'i chos
124a3: 'ga' dang ldan nam/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha'i bu bdag cag la ni chos de dag las 'ga' tsam yang med do// lha'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag de ltan byed cag nyan thos chen po mchog tu gyur pa ma yin par mi 'gyur ram
124a4: shA ri'i bus smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ga nag rjes las brten na rdzing dbu mchog yin pa de bzhin du nyan thos gzhan dag las brten na kho bo cag kyang mchog yin no// 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po las brten
124a5: na 'og gi chu'i phung po mchog yin pa de bzhin du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las brten na byang chub sems dpa' mchog yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bus de ni nyan thos mngon pa'i nga rgyal//
124a6: med pa rnams kyis bstan pa yin te legs so legs so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin te/ nyan thos ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin no// /
124a7: lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji las bsams te de skad smra/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar nyan thos rnams ni sangs rgyas la brten nas nga rgyal spangs pa yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i
124a8: nga rgyal can yin la/ nga rgyal des sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub par byed pas na de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal lhag pa'i nga rgyal can
124b1: ni bdag la bstod par byed cing gzhan la smod par byed pa yin no/ / byang chub sems dpa' yang de lta bur mi 'gyur ram/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag la bstod par byed cing
124b2: gzhan la smod par byed pa yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci las bsams te de skad smra/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni rnam grangs du mar theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa brjod par byed
124b3: cing nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i bsngags pa ma yin par brjod par byed pa dang / ji ltar sems can rnams byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur snyam nas bdag nyid kyi yon tan gyi chos brjod par byed cing / 'di la dga' ba'i
124b4: sems bskyed par mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas theg pa dman pa la rnam par sdang bar byed pa yin pas lha'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ni theg pa chen po la bstod par byed pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la smod par byed
124b5: pa yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ltung ba dang bcas par mi 'gyur ram/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi nor bu mching bu'i bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod cing nor bu rin
124b6: po che bai dUr+ya'i bsngags pa brjod par gyur na de yang ltung ba dang bcas par 'gyur ram/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni mi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' theg pa
124b7: chen po'i bsngags pa brjod par byed cing nyan thos kyi theg pa'i bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod par byed pa yang ltung ba dang bcas par mi 'gyur ro/ / lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu shin tu stobs dang ldan pa gang zhig gis
124b8: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bsngags pa brjod cing khams kyi rgyal po la de snya ma yin na/ de smad pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba yin snyam 'am/ lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal de lta ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
125a1: lha'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la bstod par byed cing nyan thos kyi theg pa la smod par byed pa yang spyad pa'i 'os su mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpa'
125a2: gnon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal legs so legs so// khyod kyis tshig de ni legs par smras te/ 'jam dpal theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa brjod pas ni theg pa thams cad kyi bsngags
125a3: pa brjod par 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal theg pa thams cad ni de las nges par byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro// gzhan yang lha'i bu rab rtul sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//
125a4: 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la brten nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par byed/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa la rten nas byang chub
125a5: tu sems bskyed par byed do/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa la brten nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par byed/ 'jam dpal gyis
125a6: smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dag byang chub kyi theg pa ma yin du zin na ni byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub tu sems bskyed nas go cha gyon par mi 'gyur ro// lha'i bus smras pa
125a7: 'jam dpal byang chub kyi sems ci zhig pa brten/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la brten to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
125a8: nibyang chub kyi sems kyi rtsa ba la brten nas skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni ci la brten/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu chos thams cad ni rtsa ba med pa'i
125b1: gnas la brten pa yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu chos thams cad ni mtha' yas pa'i phyir rtsa ba med pa dang / mngon par skabs yod pa dang / nam mkha' la brten pa yang yin pa'i phyir ro// lha'i
125b2: bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ji snyed yod/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu chos thams cad ji snyed pa de snyed yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos
125b3: thams cad sangs rgyas pas na lha'i bu de'i phyir chos thams cad ji snyed pa sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang de snyed do/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'o na ci 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi
125b4: chos yin nam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin te/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa de dag gi rtsa ba'i gnas rjes su rtogs
125b5: pa ni sangs rgyas yin no zhes ston pa'i phyir ro/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang gis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu rnam grangs med pas
125b6: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas su 'gyur gyi/ rnam grangs kyis ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni sems can thams cad rtogs par thugs su chud pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal
125b7: ji ltar rtogs par thugs su chud/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sems can med pa'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas so// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid kyis ci zhig rtogs par byed/ 'jam
125b8: dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te cung zad rjes su rtogs par byed na ni de stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid ni rnam par rtog pa med pa dang rtsol ba med pa yin pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/
126a1: 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas stong pa nyid rjes su rtogs pa ni byang chub yin no zhes ma gsungs sam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ khwa'i bu stong pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid byang chub yin pa pa//
126a2: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang stong pa nyid rjes su rtogs pa kho na byang chub yin no zhes gsungs so// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid la gnas pa ci zhig la gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu
126a3: stong pa nyid la gnas pa ni 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa la gnas pa ma yin/ drang po dang / khams dang / skye mched la gnas pa ma yin/ lus dang sems la gnas pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhen/ lha'i bri
126a4: gnas pa gang gis gnas par 'gyur ba'i gnas pa de yang stong pas na stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi gnas
126a5: pas gnas par mi mdzad dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa nyid stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnyis su med
126a6: pa'i gnas pas gnas par mdzad do/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gnyis su med pa'i gnas pas gnas pa gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gnyis su med pa'i gnas pa ni gnyis su med pa nyid zha
126a7: gyi de la gnas pa gzhan med de/ de'i gnas pa gnyis su med pa las gzhan med pa de nyid kyang gnyis su med pa nyid yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gnyis shes bya ba ni gang / gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba ni
126a8: gang / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'dod chags dang / 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa de ni gnyis so// 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis su med pa'o// zhe sdang dang zhe sdang med par byed pa de ni gnyis so// zhe sdang
126b1: rang bzhin ni gnyis su med pa'o/ / gti mug dang gti mug med par byed pa de ni gnyis so// gti mug gi rang bzhin ni gnyis su med pa'o// nyon mongs pa dang nyon mongs pa med par byed pa de ni gnyis so// nyon mongs pa'i//
126b2: rang bzhin ni gnyis su med pa'o// bdag dang bdag med par bya ba de ni gnyis so// bdag gi rang bzhin ni gnyis su med pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag gi rang bzhin gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras
126b3: pa/ lha'i bu bdag gi rang bzhin ni bzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir bdag med pa nyid yin no// bdag gi rang bzhin ni bzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir bzod ma nas dben pa nyid dang / bzod ma nas ma skyes pa nyid dang / bzod ma nas
126b4: mabyung ba nyid yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de ni 'gyur ba med pas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o// de ni bzod ma nyid nas gsal zhing nyon
126b5: mongs pa can ma yin pas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o/ / de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam zhing tshad med pas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o// de ni spros pa dang bral ba dang / de ni rgyu ba dang bral ba dang / de
126b6: ni 'od gsal bas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o/ / de ni blang ba med pa dang dor ba med pas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal rang bzhin mi shes pa dag gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras
126b7: pa/ lha'i tha gang dag chos rnams kyi rang bzhin mi shes pa dag go// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal rang bzhin shes pa dag gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag de dag gi rang bzhin shes pa dag/
126b8: lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal dad pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dad pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid ni chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin no// lha'i bus
127a1: smras pa/ 'am dpal dge slong dang pa dang mi ldan pa jig dad pas byin pa la dad par byed/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i budang pa dang me ldan pa zhes bya ba ni gang mngon sum du gyur pa'i chos thams
127a2: cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing gzhan gyi dang pas yang dang yang du mi 'gro ba yin pas de'i phyir dad pa dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ste/ de ni dad pas byin pa spyod par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir
127a3: ro/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal dge slong gang dge 'dun dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de la 'di skad ces bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dge slong gang dge 'dun dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de ni des na 'jig rten
127a4: gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu dge 'dun ni 'dus ma byas pa yin la/ byang chub sems dang sa ni 'dus ma byas dang lhan cig mi gnas pas de'i phyir de ni 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ba yin/
127a5: pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' 'dus ma byas dang lhan cig gnas par gyur na nyes pa cir 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu 'dus ma byas thob nas sems can
127a6: rnams skyob par mi byed cing nyan thos su 'gyur bas de'i nyes pa ni der 'gyur ro/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'dus byas ni so so'i skye bo'i sa yin la/ 'dus ma byas ni 'phags pa rnams kyi sa yin na/ 'o na ji ltar
127a7: byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i sa spangs shing so so'i skye bo'i sa la gnas pa 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas la yang mi gnas/
127a8: 'dus ma byas la yang mi gnas pas de'i phyir de ni 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'du byed las yid bskyod pa dang 'dus ma byas la mi gnas pa yin pas
127b1: 'dus byas kyi skyon dang bral ba dang / 'dus ma byas shes pa rtogs pa yin te/ de 'dus byas kyi skyon dang bral bas ni 'dus byas la mi gnas la/ 'dus ma byas shes pa rtogs pas ni 'dus ma byas su mi ltung ba'i phyir ro//
127b2: lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ tshan po che chen pos steng gi bar snang la mda' 'phangs par thar la/ de nas mda' de nam mkha' la miganas par 'dug cings la yang mi ltung na/ lha'i bu de la dka' ba zung zad yod dam/
127b3: lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal dka'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'dus byas kyang mi spong zhing 'dus ma byas kyang thob par byed la/ 'dus ma byas
127b4: su yang mi ltung zhing 'dus byas thob pa rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed pa ni ches dka' ba yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i 'jigs pa 'dus byas sa ma'on te 'dus ma byas sam/ kang
127b5: las 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'jigs pa ni 'dus byas las kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'dus ma byas las kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu 'dus
127b6: byas las ni nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung la/ 'dus ma byas las ni nyon mongs pa med pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa med pas 'jigs pa ci yod/ 'jam dpal
127b7: gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu khams gsum na ni nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa yod la/ byang chub sems dpa' gang khams gsum du nyon mongs par mi byed na de ni nyan thos su 'gyur ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji lta
127b8: nabyang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi shes pas 'dus byas la spyod par byed cing thabs kyi shes pas 'dus ma byas su mi srung
128a1: bde lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no/ / lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can la lta bas 'dus byas spong bar mi byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos la
128a2: skabs 'dus ma byas su mi byung ba de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no/ / lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi tshogs nye bar bsag pa'i phyir 'dus byas la sbyor ba
128a3: byed cing sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi tshogs nye bar bsag pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas su mi ltung ba de lta na byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no/ / lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'dus ma byas
128a4: la gnas te bsam gtan rnams skyed par byed cing thabs la gnas te bsam gtan rnams las ldog par byed pa de lta na byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no/ / lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems
128a5: dpa' byang chub kyi sems la gnas te dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar sogs par byed cing / snying rje chen po la gnas te sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa de lta na byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no//
128a6: lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dben pa la gnas te bdud kyi las rnams rtogs par byed cing thabs la gnas te bdud kyi las rnams spong bar byed pa de lta na byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa
128a7: med pa yin no/ / lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pa chen po la gnas te chos ston par byed cing snying rje chen po la gnas te zang zing gi sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa de lta na byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs
128a8: pa med pa yin no/ / lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba la gnas te mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su spyad pa'i las byed cing / mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas te 'khor ba yongs su sbyang ba'i las
128b1: byed pa de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no/ / lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' skye ba med pas skye bar byed cing / 'pho ba med pas 'byung bar byed pa dang / chos la lta bas snang
128b2: bar byed cing / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi rab tu phye ba ma yin pa dang / thams cad dang rjes su 'brel zhing zhi ba dang nye bar zhi bar gyur pa dang / 'bar bar byed cing 'bar bas tshig par mi byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa
128b3: thams cad la yongs su spyod par byed cing nyon mongs pa'i skyon rnams kyis mi gos pa dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa rnams 'dul bar byed cing nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba la reg par mi byed pa dang / sems can rnams kyi
128b4: bsam pa la 'jug cing chos kyi bsam pa spong bar mi byed pa dang / bdud kyi lcags kyu shes par byed cing chos kyi lcags kyu spong bar mi byed pa dang / shes pas 'jug par byed cing thabs kyis ldog par byed pa dang / 'phags
128b5: pa'i rnam pa ston par byed cing 'phags pa ma yin pa yongs su smin par bya ba la spro bar byed pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba la mngon par dga' bar byed cing chos mthong ba la kun tu 'dod par byed pa de tsam gyis ni byang chub
128b6: sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu lnga khri chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// lha'i bu nyi khri lnga stong ni len pa
128b7: med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa lnga khri ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri ni spobs pa thogs pa
128b8: med pa skyes so/ / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags stong phrag rab tu mang po dag gis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lha'i mchod pa dag byas so/
129a1: gzhan yang lha'i bu brtsal sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin 'jam dpal gyis sgras
129a2: g+hag+ha'i bragang gin byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags srung ba'i phyir yang chos ston par byed pa/ da chags dang thalab mngon du yang mi byed pa dang / zhe sang spang ba'i snying yang chos son par byed pa'i snang slong ba ma
129a3: mi byed pa dang / gaN+DI sag spang ba'i phyir yang chos ston par byed la gti mug snang ba mdun d+ha yang mi byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir nas smyon par yang byed la nyon mongs pa slong ba mngon du yang mi byed padang ma chis na/
129a4: lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la stong pa nyid ston par yang byed la/ stong pa nyid mngon du yang mi byed pa dang / sems can
129a5: nams la mtshan ma med pa ston par yang byed la mtshan ma med pa mngon du yang mi byed pa dang / sems can rnams la smon pa med pa ston par yang byed la smon pa med pa mngon du yang mi byed pa dang / de bzhin du sems can
129a6: narnams la mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang mi ldan pa dang / 'gog pa'i chos ston par yang byed la/ 'gog pa mngon du yang mi byed pa
129a7: de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no/ / lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mi gtong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang / tshul khrims las yang /
129a8: dag par 'da' bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub par byed pa dang / gnod sems kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang / lo los brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang / rjed ngas
129b1: pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang / bems po dang / lug ltar lkug pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no// lha'i bus
129b2: smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji las bsams te de skad smra/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su mi gtong ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can yongs su mi
129b3: gtong ba dang / chos yongs su mi gtong ba dang / byang chub kyi sems yongs su mi gtong ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ni chos de dag yongs su mi gtong bas sbyin pa'i pha
129b4: rol tu phyin pa bsgrub par byed do/ / lha'i bu tshul khrims las yang dag par 'da' ba zhes bya ba de ni de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i tshig bla dgas te/ tshul khrims las yang dag par 'da' bas ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin
129b5: las yang dag par 'da' bas shes rab dang / shes rab las yang dag par 'da' bas rnam par grol ba shes pa bsgrub par byed de/ lha'i bu khyod kyis rnam grangs des gang tshul khrims las yang dag par 'da' ba de
129b6: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub par byed pa yin par rig par bya'o/ / lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang gnod sems la zhugs pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pa las log par zhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
129b7: theg pa las log par zhugs pa yin pas de ni theg pa chen po la legs par zhugs pa yin te/ gang theg pa chen po la legs par zhugs pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub par byed pa yin no// lha'i bu
129b8: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' lus kyis rtul bar mi byed cing / ngag dang sems kyis rtul bar mi byed pa de ni le lo can yin la/ gang de ltar chos la mngon par brtson pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
130a1: bsgrub par byed pa yin no/ / lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni rmi lam na yang sa gnyis po dag la dga' ba'i sems bskyed par mi byed pas de ni brjed ngas pa yin la/ gang nyan thos dang /
130a2: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la brjed nges pa de ni theg pa chen po la mnyam par gzhag pa yin pas de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub par byed pa yin no// lha'i bu chos thams cad ni bems po ste/ rtswa dang / shing
130a3: dang rtsig pa dang / lam dang / mig yor dang / lug ltar lkug pa dang 'dra bar rang bzhin gyis nus pa med pa yin pas/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang ye shes kyis de ltar chos thams cad bems po dang /
130a4: lug ltar lkug pa lta bur byang chub sgrub par byed pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yin te/ de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni lam sgrub par byed pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe /
130a5: byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i lam yang mi spong la mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam yang tshol bar byed pa dang / lam gyi las kyi rgyun yang mi gcod cing lam gyi bya ba yang sgrub par byed pa dang / lam ngan par zhugs pa'i
130a6: sems can rnams kyang lam la 'god par byed pa de lta na byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no/ / lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad dang chos thams cad btsal
130a7: yang mi rnyed pa dang / byang chub kyi lam spong bar mi byed pa dang / 'bras bu yod par bsam gtan byed pa de lta na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi lam thob pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dang
130a8: nyan thos kyi lam yang rab tu shes la nyan thos kyi lam gyis nges par 'byung bar yang mi byed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam yang rab tu shes la/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gyis nges par 'byung bar mi byed pa dang / byang
130b1: chub sems dpa'i lam yang thob par byed la/ lam des kyang dbang po yongs su ma rdzogs par nges par 'byung bar mi byed pa de lta na byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub
130b2: sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba'i 'bras bu don du mi gnyer ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa'i skyon gyis mi gos pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba thams
130b3: cad byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed pa dang / byang chub kyi phyir 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / 'bri ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de lta na byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no// lha'i
130b4: bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' lam ngan pa las lam yongs su tshol bar byed pa dang / lam yongs su btsal nas kyang nges par 'byung bar mi byed pa de lta na byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa
130b5: yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lam ngan pa las la ma yongs su tshol bar byed/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu lam ngan pa zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba ste/ byang chub sems dgra
130b6: ni de la gnas nas sems can nges par 'byung ba'i phyir lam yongs su tshol bar byed kyi/ bdag nyid nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ni ma yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni 'jig rten tham
130b7: cad dang mi mthun pa yin no/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jig rten na spyod kyang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis mi gos pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa ston par byed kyang nyon
130b8: mongs pa med pa nyid du mi ltung ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba ston par byed kyang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med par shes shing skyon med pa mngon du mi byed pa dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la yongs su
131a1: spyod par byed kyang phung po dang khams dang skye mched don du mi gnyer ba dang / phung po dang khams dang skye mched yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston kyang yongs su shes pa de dag yo/
131a2: su shes par mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang // snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par sgrub par byed cing sems rnam par g.yengs pa rnams nye bar 'jog par byed kyang nye bar 'jog pa
131a3: la 'byung bar mi byed pa dang / bdud kyi yul nye bar ston par byed kyang bdud kyi las rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul spong bar mi byed pa dang / bdud kyi yul gyi rjes su mi 'jug pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi
131a4: yul las ldog par mi byed pa dang / sems can gyi khams kyi yul nye bar len par byed pas na de'i phyir sems can chen po de dag gi spyod pa ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal
131a5: khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa la spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu bsam pa yongs su dag cing nad dang phyi rol dben pa nyid kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa la spyod pa dang / rab tu spyod
131a6: pa med pa nyid kyis sbyor ba la spyod pa dang / sems mi brjed pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi sems mi brjod pa la spyod pa dang / sems dul ba nyid kyis sbyin pa la skyed pa dang / sems zhi ba nyid kyis tshul khrims la spyod pa dang smras
131a7: pa med pa nyid kyis bzod pa la spyod pa dang / lus dben pa nyid kyis brtson 'grus la spyod pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par g.yeng ba med pa nyid kyis bsam gtan la spyod pa dang / spros pa med pa nyid kyis shes rab la spyod pa dang /
131a8: sems can la bdag med pa nyid kyis byams pa la spyod pa dang / nyon mongs pa yod pa ma yin par rab tu zhi ba nyid kyis snying rje la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba'i phyir dga' ba la spyod pa dang / mtha' gnyis dang
131b1: bral ba'i phyir btang snyoms la spyod pa dang / gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir mi rtag pa la so sor rtag pa la spyod pa dang / yongs su rtog pa sdug bsngal ba'i phyir sdug bsngal la so sor rtog pa la spyod pa dang / phyin ci log rang bzhin
131b2: med pa'i phyir bdag med pa la so sor rtog pa la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas yongs su shes pa'i phyir zhi ba la so sor rtog pa la spyod pa dang / phung pe sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes pa'i phyir sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa la
131b3: spyod pa dang / ma rig pa sngon du 'gro ba'i phyir kun 'byung ba shes pa la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin gyis bgags pa'i phyir 'gog pa shes pa la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir lam shes pa la spyod pa
131b4: dang / 'bras bu yongs su shes pa nyid kyis rgyu shes pa la spyod pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir rkyen shes pa la spyod pa dang / du ma'i phyir tshogs pa la spyod pa dang / brjod du med pa'i phyir don so so yang dag par rig pa la
131b5: spyod pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i phyir chos so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang / ming dang gzugs 'byung ba med pa'i phyir nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang / brag cha dang mtshungs pa'i
131b6: phyir spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang / tshig 'bru gsal ba nyid kyis don la ston pa la spyod pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul ma spangs pa nyid kyis ye shes la ston pa la spyod pa dang / las kyi rnam
131b7: par smin pa stong pa nyid kyis nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la ston pa la spyod pa dang / gang zag yongs su smin par bya ba nyid kyis chos la ston pa la spyod pa dang / las rnam par dag pa'i phyir lha'i mig la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims
131b8: rnam par dag pa'i phyir lha'i rna ba la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa'i phyir pha rol gyi sems shes pa la spyod pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa la spyod pa dang /
132a1: sems la dbang bsgyur ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub pa la spyod pa dang / mi phyed pa'i phyir spyod pa brtan pa la spyod pa dang / mi stod pa'i phyir spyod pa sra ba la spyod pa dang bskyod du med pa'i phyir gnas med pa
132a2: la spyod pa dang / tha dad med pa nyid kyis spyod pa mnyam pa la spyod pa dang / thams cad rjes su ma brtags pa'i phyir sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' lta bur spyod pa dang / rnam par bsgrubs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir sgra
132a3: ma lta bu la spyod pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rmi lam lta bu la spyod pa dang / rnam par rmongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis smig rgyu lta bu la spyod pa dang / bdag mi sred pa'i mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / sam
132a4: rang bzhin med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshan ma med pa la spyod pa dang / khams gsum rang bzhin med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas rang bzhin med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mngon par 'du byed pa
132a5: med pa la spyod pa dang / sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa 'jug pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bdud tshar gcad pa la spyod pa dang / spyod pa thams cad rnam par bsgrubs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis dkon mchog gsum gyi
132a6: gdung mi gcod pa la spyod pa ste/ lha'i bu da ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pa yin no// / bam po gsum pa ste tha ma'o// // lha'i bus spras pa/
132a7: 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i thad de bzhin te/ lha'i bral bo ni byang chub sems dpa' ga
132a8: dad pas rjes su 'brang ba ma yin pa dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba ma yin pa dang / gang brgyad pa ma yin pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa ma yin pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba ma yin pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba ma yin pa dang / dgra
132b1: bcom pa ma yin pa dang / gang nyan thos ma yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang / gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma
132b2: yin pa dang / ston pa de ma yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin par mi smra'o// lha'i bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa' gang so so'i skye bo'i chos can ma yin pa dang / 'dod chags kyi chos can ma yin pa dang / zhe sdang gi chos can
132b3: ma yin pa dang / gti mug gi chos can ma yin pa dang / gang 'khor ba'i chos can ma yin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can ma yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin par mi smra'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam
132b4: dpal ji las bsams te skad smra/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'od
132b5: ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / ston pa dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos can dang / 'dod
132b6: chags kyi chos can dang / zhe sdang gi chos can dang / gti mug gi chos can dang / 'khor ba'i chos can dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sangs
132b7: rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dang bar byed pa dang / chags pa thams cad la dang bar byed kyang de chags par mi 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi dad pas mi 'gro ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi lam la dad pa bskyed cing 'dzin par byed pa dang /
132b8: chags pas chags par gyur pa rnams thar par byed pa dang / chags pa med pa'i ye shes yongs su tshol bar byed pa dang / 'khor ba la chags par mi byed pa dang / mya ngan las 'das par mi ltung ba de tsam gyis ni lha'i bu
133a1: byang chub sems dpa' dang pas rjes su 'brang ba yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bugang gi na bya
133a2: chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa 'dzin par byed pa dang / kun 'dzin par byed pa dang / chos kyi zas dang ldan zhing zang zing gi zas med pa dang / chos la gnas kyi nyon mongs pa la mi gnas pa dang
133a3: chos kyi stobs can yin gyi nga rgyal gyi stobs can ma yin pa dang / chos smra ba yin gyi 'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i gtam smra ba ma yin pa dang / chos kyi dbang phyug yin gyi nyon mongs pa'i dbang phyug ma yin pa dang / chos la
133a4: ston pa yin gyi gang zag la ston pa ma yin pa dang / chos smra ba yin gyi/ chos ma yin pa ma smra ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la ston pa yin gyi/ brtson pa btang ba'i chos la mi gnas pa dang / chos skyon med pa nyid
133a5: du chos thams cad shes par byed pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo chags pa med pa dang ldan pa dang / no rtsa bdun pa dang ldan pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang / chos kyi khyad par la gnas pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub
133a6: sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brgyad pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' log pa nyid brgyad
133a7: las yang dag par 'das pa dang / yang dag pa nyid brgyad la rab tu gnas pa dang / lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par spyad pa la mkhas pa dang / sbyor ba yongs su ma rdzogs par lam des nges par 'byung bar mi byed
133a8: pa dang / mi khom pa brgyad du skyes pa'i sems can rnams dal ba phun sum tshogs pa dag la 'god par byed pa dang / skyes bu dam pa'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad la gnas pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam
133b1: gtan byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa mi spong ba de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' brgyad pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgyun tu zhugs pa yin/
133b2: 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi che byang chub sems dpa' sems can rgyan phyogs su ded pa rnams thun las zlog par byed pa dang / 'khor ba'i chun thams cad kyang gcod par byed la/ 'khor ba mi gcod pa
133b3: dang / ngan song thams cad rgyun gcod par byed pa dang / sems can rnams bde 'gro dang mya ngan las 'das pa mngon du bya ba'i lam la 'god par byed pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / lha dang mi la gzhol ba dang / bden pa
133b4: ston par byed pa dang / rlom sems su mi ltung ba dang / the tsom dang bral ba dang / nges pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzhol ba dang / so so'i skye bo'i lam las yang dag par 'das pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi lam la
133b5: gnas pa dang / 'khor ba'i gting rnyed pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du phyogs par gyur pa dang / 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su gyur pa dang / 'dus byas la snang ba dang / 'dus ma byas pas rab tu bye ba dang / phyir ldog par
133b6: mi 'gyur ba dang / dge 'dun pa yang dag par gzhol ba de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rgyun tu zhugs pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin/ 'dam pa
133b7: kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med par shes nas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du 'ong ba dang / sems can rnams yongs
133b8: su smin par byed pa dang / 'ong ba dang 'gro bar ston par byed pa dang / chos nyid la 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba med par mthong ba dang / 'od yang nyon mongs pa med pas 'ong ba dang / rang gi las yongs su dag pas 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba mnyam/
134a1: pacid mi spong ba dang / 'dud cing bang dgas pa 'tho ba dang / byang rgyu kyilamanye bar stan pa 'byung ba dang / bar blangs pa'i sems can gal ba'i byang rang ba dang / kyang chub kyi gag pa'i sa pasan r+b+ha
134a2: pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' lan cig phyir 'ang ba yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi 'ong ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sams
134a3: dpa' lta ba rnams dang / phyin ci log rnams dang / sgrib pa rnams su lang mi 'ong ba dang / 'dun pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / 'jigs pa dang / gti mug gis yang 'ong ba dang / 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba dang / byas pa sa
134a4: par ma gyur cig sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma rdzogs par ma 'ong ba dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'pho ba med pa la mkhas pa dang / rga shi med pa la thob pa dang / mthar gnas pa dang / byas pa dras pa dang / lung bstan pa thob pa
134a5: dang / dmigs su med pa dang / rnam pa med pa thob pa dang / shes pas gzhan la rag ma las pa de ltan lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi 'ong ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems
134a6: dpa' dgra bcom pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med cing 'dod chags gdul ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / sdod pa med cing zhe sdang gdul
134a7: ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / tshangs pa med cing gti mug gdul ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / chos thams cad la nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa dang / sems canathams cad
134a8: la sems ma btang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la dga' ba med pas dga' ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang pad ma bzhin du nyon mongs pa thams
134b1: byas lags pa dang / shes pas 'phags pa dang mnyam pa dang / khas kyis 'phags pa ma yan pa gnas pa dang / bar yin pa thams cad la bdag gi ma cing yongs su 'dzin pa mang pa dang / sangs
134b2: kyi chos thams cad la bdag gir byed cing yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rang gi sems kyi rlud dag la zag pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud dag la zag pa med pa gnas par byed pa dang sngon dam bcas pa
134b3: dgal brnag pa yongs su chags pa dang / cha ros dang pa rol la gnas pa rnams kyi pha rol dusan pa dang / chu rom gyi gnas ma spangs pa dang / gzhan gyis sems can gzhan thar par byed pa de ltan lha'i byabyang chub sems da/
134b4: dgra bcom pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos yin/ lam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu ga gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la mthos pa'i chos sgrogs
134b5: byed cing yul rnams la spyod par mi byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i dam pa'i chos dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i tshes sgrogs par byed pa dang / rgyu dang rkyen dang / bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis gtso
134b6: ba med pa sgrogs par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa dang / nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos rnams sgrogs par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / ye shes chen po la chos thams cad rgyas nye bar 'gro bar tsam
134b7: shig ces sgrogs par byed pa dang / sgrogs pa yang gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / thos pas kyang rlom sems me byed pa dang / sgrogs pa thams cad kyi sngon dang byi ma'i mtha' mi 'chad pa yongs su shes pa dang / so so yang dag
134b8: par rig pa mi zad pa thob pa dang / don dang / tshig dang / yig 'bru mi zad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa dang / shes pa ston par byed pa dang / so so ci rigs par chos ston par byed pa dang / zhi ba'i sa la gnas
135a1: padag skam pa med pa dang ldanaH/ sngon lamagyis spyad pa ldan sar babyang chub sems dang tan ma yin// rjes smras pa/ 'dam la / na nanabyasems dpa' sasangs rgyas yon
135a2: dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rkyen la rag las pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / rnam par sbyang ba shes paganas nas
135a3: pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang / des rkyen rnams legs par mthong ba'i phyir byang chub 'dren par byed pa'i rkyen 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi phyogs dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi phyogs dang / bsdu ba'i
135a4: dngos po bzhi'i phyogs dang / tshad med pa bzhi'i phyogs dang / mngon par shes pa'i phyogs yang dag par sgrub par byed pa dang / de rkyen nye bar sgrub par byed cing gzhan gyi drid mi 'jog pas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
135a5: rgya bar byed pa dang / sa ngan pa dag las sems skyo bar byed pa dang / nyi tshe ba'i shes pa 'dul ba la mkhas pa dang / theg pa chen po la legs par rab tu gnas pa dang / chos thams cad la mngon du gyur pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub
135a6: sems dpa' rang sangs rgyas yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad gzod
135a7: ma nas dben pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad gzod ma nas bdag med pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa dang / ming mngon par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dman pa dang / mchog dang / bar ma thams
135a8: ca rtogs par byed pa dang / rang gi nyon mongs pa stong pa nyid kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad rtogs par byed pa dang / skad cig gcig la rjes su rtogs pa'i rim gyi sa dang spyod pa sna tshogs ston par byed pa dang /
135b1: sems can gyi dbang po dang mos pas chos ston par byed pa dang / 'bras bu yod par chos ston par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'dam dpal ji ltar na byang chub
135b2: sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam du 'gro ba dang / de bzhin nyid mi brjed pa dang / de bzhin nyid la rab tu gnas
135b3: pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi sbyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi tshul khrims dang / de bzhin nyid kyi bzod pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi brtson 'grus dang / de bzhin nyid kyi bsam gtan dang / de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab dang / de bzhin nyid kyi thab
135b4: dang / de bzhin nyid kyi smon lam dang / de bzhin nyid kyi stobs dang / de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi sems can med pa dang / sems can yongs su thar par byed pa dang / sems can gyi gnas dang /
135b5: 'khor ba na yang spyod la spyod pa thams cad las kyang yang dag par 'das pa dang / spyod pa las sgrol bar byed pa dang / de na yang yin la de na yang ma yin pa dang / 'den yang yin la 'di na yang ma yin pa dang / gnyis las
135b6: dag pa dang / mun pa dang bral ba dang / rtag tu gsal ba dang / mun pa med pa dang / mun pa'i ling tog dang bral ba dang / de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i rjes su song ba de lta na lha'i bu byang
135b7: chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o/ / lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das shes bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' nyon
135b8: mongs pa bcom pa dang / chu bo las rgal ba dang / sred pa mthong ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi khur dang / srid pa 'jom pa dang / srid pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba dang / bdud bcom pa dang // khur bor ba dang / sred pa'i 'gro bar
136a1: 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes pa dang / bya ba shes pa dang / srid pa'i 'dod chags bsal ba dang / lus dang sems bsgoms pa dang / tshul khrims dang shes rab bsgoms pa dang / sred pa'i skyon legs par
