158b8: spyod ldan/ / dran dang ldan zhing mtshan rnams kyis// mngon par brgyan pa dag tu 'gyur// lta bas na mdo sde 'di// thos nas phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe// gzung zhing yang dag bstan pa dang // gzhan dag la yang bstan par gyis// gang
159a1: gis sangs rgyas 'khor los sbyar/ / 'bum phrag dag la bkur byas pas// phyi ma yi ni dus dag tu// ngas mthong ba la som nyi med// gang gis sngon ni 'jig rten mgon// grangs med pa la bsnyen bkur byas//
159a2: de yis 'jig rten mgon 'di yi// thos shing mthong la'ang yid ches so// gang zhig mtshan 'di thos nas su// sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs byed pa// de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bstan pa dang ni dam chos bsrung // gang zhig
159a3: byang chub bstan spangs na/ / bskal pa bye ba dag tu ni// lug ltar lug cing mi nyams la// mig med pa dag tu yang 'gyur// gang zhig lag pa gcig gis ni// mchod rten grangs med bshig byas pas// gang gis mdo sde 'di
159a4: spangs na/ / byad ches sdig par 'di 'gyur ro// de lta bas na da smra ba// phyi ma'i dus tshe 'di rnyed nas// sangs rgyas ye shes bla med la// som nyi za bar ma byed cig/ mdo sde 'di 'dra 'di thos nas// me tog spos dang 'phan
159a5: rnams dang / / gdugs dang phye ma gos rnams kyis// gus par byas te mchod par gyis// der ni de bzhin gshegs pa yis// phyag gnyen shin tu 'jam pa yis// lid tsha byi yi mgo bo la// yang dang yang du byug pa mdzad//
159a6: de yis rjes la lha rnams kyis// sgra skad chen po phyung gyur cing // lha'i me tog ku su ma// yid 'ong gtor cing zhing 'di bkang // lha rnams mkha' la 'dug nas su// glu dbyangs dpag tu med pa len// tshangs pa da/
159a7: ni bye ba yis// tsan dan dmar po'i char phob po// de bzhin gshegs pas mdo sde 'di// gsungs tshe dra ba can thos te// sems ni rangs shing yid dga' nas// de bzhin gshegs la tshig gsol pa// phyi ma'i dus
159a8: su bdag gis ni/ / dge slong bgyis la mi 'jigs par// grong dang grong khyer rnam dag tu// mdo sde 'di ni bshad par bgyi// sangs rgyas bka' bzhin bdag bgyid de// rdzogs sangs rgyas la dpal gyis gsungs
159b1: dpag tshad bye bar mchis nas su/ / 'di yi tshul ni bshad par bgyi// lha kun dang ni klu rnams dang // yang na mi 'am ci dang ni// me man rnams 'gron gnyer te// chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par bgyi// bla na med pa'i mdo sde 'di//
159b2: sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pa na// lha ma yin tshogs dga' gyur nas// ma tag dpag tu med par 'thod// sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing 'di dag/ mi mchog gargya seng ga li// chos kyi rgyal po sku gcig gis// 'ang rnams thams cad
159b3: snang bar mdzad/ / sems can snying po'i bdag nyid can// ston pa yi ni ljags phyung nas// gang gA'i byem snyed dag gi/ zhing rnams bye ba khebs par mdzad// de bzhin phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi// di rnams bye ba khebs
159b4: mdzad de/ / gnon nu rin chen dra ba can// dpa' bo dang ni lid tsha byi// bya ba drug bcu tsam dag ni// lhan cig lpags la bka' stsal cig/ de nas der ni ston pa yis// de dag chos la gzung bar mdzad// bde ba thams cad sbyin
159b5: mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas spyan ni thogs pa med// de bzhin gshegs rnams dpag med de// sangs rgyas chos la ba com sangs// sangs rgyas ye shes thogs med de// dus gsum rnams la'ang 'dug par mdzad/ sa rnams
159b6: kun la mda' brnyes pas/ / sangs rgyas la ni mi mkhyen med// phung po rnams ni med pa'o zhes// mi yi 'dren pa ston par mdzad// khams bzhi dag ni gsog dang 'dra// gad du'ang sgra la chags pa med// gzugs dang tshor
159b7: ba'adu shes dang / sems pa dang ni 'du byed dang// ma shes brar po'i snying pon// med pa dag tu shes par bgyi// sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pa bzhin// dekar zang po nas phyen// srung du gzungs rnams 'thob 'gyur zhing // shin
159b8: rmongs pa med par 'gyur/ / chos rnams dag ni gsob dang 'dra// thams cad stong zhing bdag med do// rtsod pa med cing rmongs med pa// de// de de bzhin gshegs pas gsung // gzhon nu lho phyogs logs na gzhon nu dpe snga ma lta bkra
160a1: nyis 'gyur gyi rdul bgrangs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gnyis 'das pan de na thabs brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi 'ams yod do/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom bya yang dag par rdzogs
160a2: pa'i sangs rgyas me tog gi 'od kyis rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho ning bzhes la chos kyang ston to/ / gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
160a3: kyi bu mo gang la la zhig/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi 'od kyis rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa de'i mtshan thos nas som nyi mi za la ngas mthong ba la yang yid ches na de tshe 'das pa'i 'og tu 'od zer
160a4: rab tu gtong ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur/ / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa khrir 'jug pa 'thob par 'gyur// gzungs kyi sgo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa drug bcu po rgya
160a5: mtsho lta bu zhes bya ba'i gzungs la sogs pa nas rin po che'i mdzod kyi gzungs la thug pa'i bar la 'jug pa 'thob cing byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du de dag la rmongs par yang mi 'gyur ro/ / 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe shar phyogs
160a6: nas sangs rgyas bye ba gshegs nas zhes ston par mdzad de/ phyogs thams cad nas kyang de dang 'dra'o// gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gsungs par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/ byang chub
160a7: thob kyi bar du de'i chos kyi tshul de 'jig par mi 'gyur/ las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nas bzung nas bskal pa lnga brgyar 'khor ba las phyir phyogs par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la
160a8: reg par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// mi yi dbang po 'jig rten mgon// skyob pa yi ni mtshan thos pa// bskal pa lnga brgya tham pa yi// 'khor ba dag ni zlog par 'gyur/
160b1: 'chi ba dag gi dus tshe yang // sangs rgyas bye ba ston par mdzad// mthong nas dbang pos phyag 'tshal te// chos kyang nyan cing 'dzin par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos pa// spyad pa dam pa spyod pa na// de yis bstan pa'i chos gang
160b2: ngag/ bskal pa bye bar chud mi gson// sangs rgyas kyi ni mtshan bsgrags pas// rin chen zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin stong bag bdun bcu de tshe 'thob/ yon tan bye bad bsgrogs par 'gyur// gang zhig thub pa'i mtshan 'dzin pa// ting 'dzin grangs
160b3: me bye ba dang / / de bzhin sa ya drug bcu dag/ de la nye bar gnas par 'gyur// de bas mnyam gnag dpa' bo yis// byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// sems can mang po stong rnams dag/ byang chub mchog la 'jog par byed//
160b4: byang chub ma rdzogs bar du ni// nam yang 'dod la mi bsten de// sems can gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi// mtshan bstan nas ni bzlog par byed// gang zhig sangs rgyas mtshan thos nas// srog chags kun la 'di ston pa// nams
160b5: kyang mi khom mi 'gyur zhing / / de yid lta ba rnyed mi dga'// shin tu bzang ba sangs rgyas dag/ 'byung ba mnyes par byas pas ni// da yis mi khom gang bstan pa// de dag thams cad spongs par 'gyur// ji ltar 'dren pa mkhyen pa
160b6: bzhin/ / gzhon nu gal te khyad shes na// ston pa'i mtshan ni bzung nas su// phyogs kun tu ni rab tu sgrogs// de bas gzhon nu gzhan dag la// mtshan 'di rab tu bstan byas na// yang dag byang chub 'di bzung zhing // 'jig rten gyi ni
160b7: mgon du 'gyur/ / gang zhig sangs rgyas mtshan thos nas// g.yeng ba med par 'di bzung ste// song nas gzhan dag la ston pa// de ni byang chub mngon du bsrung // gang zhig mdo sde 'di thos nas// gzhan dag la ni rab ston na//
160b8: legs par gsungs pa'i chos kyi tshul// bstan pa 'di dag bsrung bar byed// gzhon nu nub phyogs logs na gzhon nu dpe' snga ma lta bu de las sum gyur gyi rdul phra mo'i rdul bgrangs pa'i tshul gyis de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi
161a1: khams dga'adas pan/ lagatan byakhams rin can parbag nas bzhag sa dang / don de bzhan nagags bdag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas ma rtag rgyas pas la 'artul banas byu na/
161a2: bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston to// gzhon nu theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhes de bzhin gshegs pa me tog ces pa sa la'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de'i mtshan
161a3: thos nas som nyaM mi ba la ngas mthong ba la yang yid ches nade tshe 'das pa'i 'og tu chos lnga 'dzin par 'gyur te/ lnga ga shen/ wa zhi gnas sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / der 'khor los gyur pa'i rgyal po nyid dang / mngon par
161a4: shes pa lnga dang / chos kyi rnam grangs kyi gzungs te/ de yang stong 'khyil ba'i gzungs dang byang chub thob kyi bar du skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag 'thob pa ste/ chos lnga po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas
161a5: bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/ / gang zhig mi yi b+ha mchog slob pa'i mtshan// zos nas som nyi med cing dang bskyed na// de yis chos lnga de dag 'dzin 'gyur zhing / byang chub thob pa'i
161a6: bar du 'jigs mi 'gyur/ / gser gyi mdog 'dra'i gzugs dang ldan 'gyur zhing // 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dam mchog mkhas// bsod nams ldan pa sreng med bu 'dra zhing // dam chos 'khor lo bar chad med par bgog/
161a7: bsod nams ldan pa bu stong yod 'gyur te// dpa' zhing rtul bong pha rol tshogs 'joms la// yan lag mchog gi gzugs ldan mtshan gyis brgyan// mthu stobs che ba rgyal po gtso nyid 'dra// rgyal po'i chung ma gzugs
161a8: bzang gzugs mdzes pa/ / gser gyi mdog 'dra mang po stong yod 'gyur// phyi nas nyal zhing sdang ni ldang byed de// rgyal po gtsal rnams kyang skyo mi byed// rgyal phran gang dag de'i yul gnas shing // gang dag blon po khyim
161b1: bdag gca ba kun/ / rgyal ba da mthong nams kyang su mi byed/ dbas dan bsod nams dam mnag ldan/ mabs mchog lda rnams kyis kyang thub par dka'/ ma'i 'jig tan dag na gnad sbyin na/ de sa sul na
161b2: sems can gang gnas pa/ / de yis thams cad byang chub snying por 'jog/ rgyal srid rgyas shing shin tu lo legs dang // de yi rgyal srid bde zhing sangs rgyas 'byung // de dag la ni mchod pa dam pa byed// rgyal po bdag
161b3: yul rnams kyang sdang sems med/ / sangs rgyas mtshan mchog thos nas mkhas pa gang // so ma nyi za zhing mi dga' su zhig yod// mdo sde dam pa de ring ngas bshad pa'i// chos mchog 'di yis de la phan
161b4: 'dogs 'gyur/ / gzhan du gang gis sngon gyi rgyal rnams kyis// chos spangs gyur pa 'am bdud kyi zin pa 'am// sems can snying po rgyal ba mchog dag ni// sngon chad spyod tshe khyad du bsad ma gtogs// gnon
161b5: nugang shig rgyal po'i pho brang dang / / ling tsha'i bkod pa dga' ba 'di dag kyang // shAkya seng ge ni mi mthong ba// de dag sangs rgyas mtshan thos som nyi za// gzhon nu byang phyogs logs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas
161b6: gzhon nu dpe snga ma lta bu de las su ma gyur gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug bcu 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen dra bas g.yogs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
161b7: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston to// gzhon nu theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la bzhin
161b8: d e bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag de'i mtshan thos nas som nyi ma za zhing ngas mthong ba la yang yid ches na de tshe 'das pa'i 'og tu rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par
162a1: ' am ng+ya thas rnyed kyis su rnas ba drug da pas bkyi yong palas byas pa zhugs da ga na rnamam sa dpa shAn me pa
162a2: rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rig par 'gyurd/ dbyangs spyan ldan zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin kyang thob par 'grub blan med pa sang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro// nga med gangs lani/
162a3: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nam dag de'i mtshan thos nas som nyi mi bzhing the tsom mi sbre la ngas mthong ba la yang yid ches na/ de tshe 'das pa'i 'og tu bud med kyi dbang po rnam par
162a4: par 'gyur zhing skyes pa'i dbang po thob par 'gyur/ sems can mang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jog par 'gyur// dbyangs snyan ldan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob par 'gyur
162a5: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang zhig rkang gnyis dam pa nga'i mtshan/ bos nas
162a6: nams kyang som nyi mi za ba/ / bskal pa bye ba gang gA'i bye ma snyed// des spangs mya ngan med pa'i skyes par 'gyur// gang gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas du ma dag/ mthong nas de dag la ni mtshon par byed// de snyed sangs rgyas de'i tshe
162a7: gcig gis/ / sangs rgyas mchod nas rgyal ba mya ngan 'das// byang chub das pa spyod mchog spyod pa na// gang gis skyes bu khyu mchog sa tshan thos nas// rnams kyang som nyi med cing 'dzin byed na// de 'dra'i khyad par de
162a8: yis 'thob par 'gyur/ / gang gi mtshan mchog gtso bo 'di// thos nas som nyi mi za ba// rang byung ye shes sangs rgyas nyid myur zhing // mkhas pas dbyangs snyan ting 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur// byang chub dam pa spyod
162b1: mchog spyod pa na/ / dag pa'i bdag nyid skyes pa'i dbang po 'thob// yon tan kun dang ldan zhing mdzes pa ste// de 'dra'i khyad pa rede yis thob par 'gyur// phyogs rnams kun ni rab tu snang byed cing // sa yi mtha'
162b2: yas zhing du song nas su/ / 'jig rten spyod pa thub pa che mthong nas// mya ngan bral te byang chub phyis reg 'gyur/ thub dpang chen po de bzhin gshegs pa ni// de yi mtshan 'dir thos nas rdzu 'phrul mchog/ de 'dra'i khyad par
162b3: dag ni thob par 'gyur/ / byang chub 'dod pa gzhan yang 'thob pa ni// dri bral byang chub 'dun pa bskyed nas su// rgyal ba'i mtshan 'di gzhan la'ang sgrogs par byed// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu gsal ba ltar// de yi
162b4: yon tan dag kyang de 'drar 'gyur/ / sems can mang po du ma bsam mi khyab/ byang chub mchog la mkhas pa de yis 'jog/ zla ba mkha' la gnas pa'i gzhal med lang // 'od zer mang po bsags pas mdzes pa ltar//
162b5: gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'dzin pa// de yi lus kyang de 'dra'i rnam pas mdzes// mkhas pa gang zhig rgyal ba'i mtshan thos nas// som nyi za zhing mi dga' su zhig yod// byang chub spyod mchog dam pa spyod pa na// chos
162b6: 'di dag gis de la phan 'dogs 'gyur/ / thub pa chen po 'jig rten spyod mchog pas// mkhas pa de ni phongs par myong mi 'gyur// gzhon nu 'og gi phyogs na gzhon nu dpe snga ma lta bu'i rnam pa de bzhin du dgu bcu rtsa dgur bskur ba gnas
162b7: nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal mtshan mchog gi bdag po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu zhi ba mkhas pa'i gzi brjid dbyangs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po
162b8: zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston to/ / gzhon nu theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba mkhas pa'i gzi brjid
163a1: dbyangs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po de'i mtshan thos nas som nyi mi thal ngas mthong ba la yang yid ches na de tshe 'das pa'i 'og tu kun nas 'od zer bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi
163a2: tshe yang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum du tshad pa dag mthong bar 'gyur/ shar phyogs su ji lta ba bzhin phyogs thams cad gu yang de bzhin du sangs rgyas bye ba khrag thig phrag 'bum du tshad pa dag mthong bar 'gyur//
163a3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bstan pa de dag thams cad kun du 'dzin par 'gyur// byang chub la thug gi bar du sangs rgyas grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyug/
163a4: las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcur 'khor ba las phyir phyogs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid tshig
163a5: su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig 'jig rten rnam 'dren sangs rgyas kyi// yon tan rgya mtsho'i mtshan mchog thos gyur pa// des ni sangs rgyas bye ba khri rnams la// myur du mchod pa bla med rab tu byed// mtha' yas dri med
163a6: khyad par mchod byas shing / / srid pa kun tu sangs rgyas che rnams kyi// nyi ma mdzad pa'i spyod pa spyad nas su// phyis ni byang chub dran dbang des reg 'gyur// ji ltar gang gA'i bye snyed rnam par 'dren// mang po dag ni tshe gcig gis
163a7: mchod de/ / kun nas 'od zer ting nge 'dzin thob nas// phyis ni byang chub mya ngan med reg 'gyur// byang chub dri med byang chub che thob nas// chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa rab tu bskor// sems can sangs rgyas byang chub mchog bzhag nas
163a8: char chus me bas da ltar ni mya ngan 'da'/ / rkang gnyis 'dren pa mi 'dul kha lo sgyur// bsod nams zhing ste bsod nams phung po gcig/ de la mi yis dad pa tsam bskyed na// skad cig gis ni mi khom thams cad spong // gang
163b1: zhig bde bar gshegs pa'i mtshan 'don pa/ / mi lus rnyed pa dal ba cig thob nas// mtha' yas rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs bzhugs la// mi yi mkhas pa bsod nams rab tu byed// sangs rgyas mtshan ni stong phrag brgya
163b2: tsam du/ / goms byed de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa 'thob// lha yi mig 'thob ji ltar nga yis ni// sangs rgyas mar me mdzad mthong me tog gis// gtor ba byas nas bzod pa thob gyur pa// de 'dra'i bzod pa dag ni thob par 'gyur
163b3: 'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad thub pa yi/ / mtshan ni thos nas su zhig lung mi nong// gzhan du gang zhig mu stegs can gyur pa 'am// phrag dog dag gis nyams pa'i mi ma btogs// 'dren pa sangs rgyas kyi ni mngon
163b4: sum du/ / 'di 'dra'i mdo sde bshad pa sus thos pa// de ni phyi dus dag tu 'di 'dzin cing // gzhan dag la yang rab tu ston par byed// gzhon nu steng gi phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas gzhon nu dpe snga ma lta bu
163b5: de las gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das nas 'jig rten gyi khams shin du rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtson 'grus grangs med pas//
163b6: yang dag par rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba zhig bzhugs te mtsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston to// gzhon nu theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa
163b7: b rtson 'grus grangs med pas yang dag par rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba de'i mtshan thos nas som nyi mi za la ngas mthong ba la yang yid ches na 'das pa'i 'og tu rnams kyang brtson 'grus dman par mi 'gyur nas kyang
163b8: 'dod pa la bsten par mi 'gyur/ nams kyang ma'i sdug bsngal gyis gos par mi 'gyur/ pha'i sdug bsngal dang / gnyen gyi sdug bsngal dang / spun gyi sdug bsngal gyis gos par mi 'gyur/ sring mo'i sdug bsngal gyis/
164a1: gas par mi 'gyur/ nams kyang mdza' bo dang / bshes gnyen dang / blon po dang / sdug gi gnyen mtshams kyi sdug bsngal gyis gas par mi 'gyur / nams kyang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
164a2: gnyis kyis lus ma brgyan par mi 'gyur/ nams kyang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug mang bar mi 'gyur/ nams kyang nang med par mi 'gyur/ nams kyang mya ngan mang bar mi 'gyur// bde ba mtha' yas
164a3: payongs su bzung bar 'gyur/ byang chub la thug gi bar du yon tan mtha' yas pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pas yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid tshigs
164a4: su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/ / gang zhig 'jig rten mgon po'i mtshan// thos nas som nyi mi za ba// nams kyang pha ma gnyen 'dun gyi// tshogs kyi sdug bsngal mi mthong ngo // steng gi phyogs na rkang gnyis mchog
164a5: 'jig rten snang bar mdzad pa bzhugs/ / srid gsum gsal bar mdzad nas su// srog chags rnams la chos ston to// rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i mtshan thos nas// de ni gzhan rnams rab bstan na// rtag tu sum
164a6: cu rtsa gnyis kyi/ / mtshan dag gis ni brgyan par 'gyur// gang zhig thub pa'i mtshan 'dzin na// de ni shes rab mi nyams shing // byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// byang chub sems dpa' la yang mchod// sangs rgyas kyi
164a7: ni mtshan bstan pas/ / phyis ni byang chub spyod pa na// sangs rgyas bye ba bsam mi khyab// shes rab can gyis rtag mchod 'gyur// sangs rgyas mtshan ni gang thos na// gzhan rnams la yang rab ston na// de 'dra'i bsod//
164a8: nams phung po yi// tshad ni bshad par mi nus so// de ltar mtshan ni thos pa ni// phyi dus dag ni mang por yang // bla med sangs rgyas ye shes la// der ni som nyi za mi byed// gang gis rdzogs sangs rgyas mthong nas/
164b1: bkur sti rim gro byas pa ni// phyi ma'i dus su mdo sde 'di// de yi lag tu 'thob par 'gyur// da ni byang chub sems dpa' yis// bskor dang dra ba can sus mthong // des ni mdo sde 'di thos nas// de la som nyi za mi 'gyur//
164b2: de bzhin gshegs pa dpag med de// sangs rgyas chos la the tsom spangs// 'di ltar sngon gyi spyod pa ni// bskal pa bye ba mad brgyar spyad// lag pa rkang pa gtong ba dang // rna ba sna dang mgo bo dang // bu pho bu mo yul
164b3: 'khor dag/ byin la yid ni mi dga' med// gang zhig mdo sde 'di thos pa// phyi ma'i dus na rnyed nas ni// gzhan dag la yang ston byed na// de ni mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul pa// mngon
164b4: rdzogs byang chub 'dod gang gis/ / nam yang 'jig rten mgon po yi// bstan la som nyi ma za cig/ de ltar mdo sde 'di thos nas// g.yo sgyu med pa'i mis gzung la// 'chag pa dag du'ang yang dang yang // mdo
164b5: sde 'di ni brjod par gyis/ / brjod byas zla ba gsum dag tu// tshangs par shin tu yang brjod na// chos rnams thams cad 'dzin byed pa'i// gzungs kyi ye shes thob par 'gyur// de nas li tshi byi gzhon nu rin chen dra ba
164b6: can bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa rig nas rin thang med pa'i ras bcos bu gser gyis brgyan pa zung cig bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gsol te/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe
164b7: rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa ji lta bus bcom ldan 'das kyi sku thams cad kyi ba spu'i khong bu thams cad nas 'od zer dag byung ste/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grang med pa ji snyed pa
164b8: de dag thams cad snang bar gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong ba dang // sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi
165a1: dkyil 'khor du sems can gang dag 'dus pa de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de mthong ba dang / de'i tshe gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'kho
165a2: bzhi po la snang bar gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lid tsha byi gzhon nu rin chen dra ba can la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu khyod kyis steng/
165a3: gi phyogs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bsam gyis mi khyag/ 'di ltar gzhal gyis mi lang ga/ 'di ltar thug pa med pa// 'di ltar tshad med pa/ 'di ltar brjod kyis mi lang ba de dag mthong ngam/
165a4: gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// de bang gshegs pa mthong lags so// bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po jig rten gyi khams na lha dang mi rnams kyi ming gi tshogs
165a5: pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan ches mang ste/ ral yang mtshan gyis tshogs grangs med pas mgyis mi khyab pa yod de/ 'di ltar shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par rab tu zhi pa'i dpal
165a6: dbyangs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba rnams dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag ces bya ba rnams dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi 'od kyis rnam par rol pa mngon par
165a7: mkhyen pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba rnams dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rgyas pa sa la'i rgyal po zhes bya ba rnams dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od zer zla bas brgyan pa mkhas pa'i gzi
165a8: brjid dbyangs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po zhes bya ba rnams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi mtshan ji lta bar de bzhin gshegs pa so so'i mtshan yang de dang 'dra bar mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
165b1: mthong lag so/ / bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang / de bzhin du steng gi phyogs te/ de ltar phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs/
165b2: rere na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gcig pa yang grangs ma mchis la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan tha dad pa yang bzhugs so// bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu khyod kyis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid la
165b3: gnas pa de bas kyang ches lhag pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// de nas lid tsha byi gzhon nu rin
165b4: chen dra ba can mgu zhing dga' la yid rangs/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba bskyes nas de'i tshes chen po g.yos par gyur te// sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba skyed pa dang /
165b5: sems can thams cad kyi sems rab tu dga' ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa'i snang ba chen po byung bar gyur te// lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag nam mkha' la 'khod nas lha'i 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser
165b6: gyi phye ma rnams gtor ro/ / tshangs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis kyang lha'i tsan dan dmar po'i phye ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor ro// mngon par gtor / mngon par rab tu gtor ngo // lha
165b7: bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis kyang lha'i me tog ud dpal dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man da ra ba dang / man dar ba chen pos gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu
165b8: gtor ro/ / bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma de dag gis kyang rin po che'i gdugs stong phul lo// bya ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas
166a1: dus te/ / gnas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag rjes su dran no// 'di lta ste sangs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis kyang tshe 'phrul bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mdag
166a2: bstan to/ / de la 'i shes bya ste// bye ba brgya phrag dra ma yi// lha rnams khor khor yug nas// can dan dmar po zhib mo yis// rdzogs sangs rgyas la 'bor bar byed// brgya byin bye ba phrag stong dag/ mkha' la gnas nas 'dzam bu yi/
166a3: bo'i gser bye mang po 'o// de bzhin gshegs la 'thor bar byed// tshangs pa bye ba nyer lhags nas// tsan dan dmar po'i phye ma yis// rdzogs sangs rgyas la 'bor byed cing // sgra dbyangs snyan pa kun tu sgrogs/ dri ma med pa'i 'od
166a4: rig nas/ / nam mkha' la ni lha mkhod do// glu dbyangs dpag tu med pa len// mkha' la ras kyi g.yob par byed// nam mkha' la ni lha 'khod de// pad ma brgya phrag stong blangs nas// 'jig rten gsalal stong byed cing // rgyal mtshan
166a5: la sogs mchod par byed/ / zla med rgyal mchog thub dbang la// rab tu yi dgas phyag 'tshal zhing // bstod byed nor bu rin chen dang // mu tig rgyan phreng 'thor bar byed// mi ni bye ba 'bum tham pa// rgyal mchog bla med pa la mchod//
166a6: sngon gyi gnas brgya rjes dran zhing // dub mchod bla med mgos phyag 'tshal// de nas 'jig rten snang mdzad pas// chos kyi rnga ni rab rdungs te// de'i sgras ni zhing rab mang// bye ba dag tu go bar byas// de'i tshe ni sems can ni// bye ba
166a7: grangs med kun nas lhags/ / de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// sangs rgyas ye shes bla med bkod// de tshe gzhon nu dga' gyur nas// tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po yi// gdan 'bul rin chen bye ma yis// gzhon nu sangs rgyas gcos
166a8: mchod/ / nor bu rin chen 'od gcig ni// 'jig rten stong du gtong bar byed// rin chen gcig las 'od zer ni// stong phrag bye ba stong par byed// de bzhin rin chen ma lus las// 'od zer dag ni byung bar gyur// de dag gis ni de'i
166b1: tshe/ / yangs pa can yang snang bar byas/ rin chen rnam pa de snyed kyis// sangs rgyas gcol mchod byed cing / rin po che'i phung po yang // thub pa chel 'bral bar byed/ gdugs ni gang dag su lud byas// mu tig phreng gis yongs brgyan pa//
166b2: re re la yang mu khyud can// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga'o 'di 'dra'i legs pa de yis ni// thub pa che la mchod pa byas// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la// gser thags kyi ni gos phul lo// byang chub shing dag sprul nas su//
166b3: de'i drung seng ge'i khri bshams la// stong phrag bye ba nyi shu lnga// de rnams la ni 'khod gyur pa// lo ni bye ba grangs snyed par// bgrang ba dag tu michod pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ni// bye ba brgya phrag lhags par gyur//
166b4: shar gyi phyogs nas gzung nas su// lho phyogs nub phyogs byang phyogs dang // 'og dang steng dang de bzhin du// phyogs dag gi yang mtshams nas lhags// ji tsam mig gis mthong ba'i bar// de srid 'jig rten khams rnams su//
166b5: skyob pa 'jig rten mgon po yi// gser gyi mdog 'dra'i 'od kyis gang // ston pa gang na bzhugs pa dang / chos ni gdan 'bar ba der// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad nas// byang chub sems dpa' nye bar lhags// de ltar mtha
166b6: yas dpag tu med/ / bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa ni// rin chen dra ba lid tsha byi// gzhon nu de yi tshe na byas// de nas bdag nyid chen po ba// lha dang klu dang mi rnams kyis// 'dun du mi mchog shAkya yi// seng ges dbugs ni 'byin
166b7: par mdzad/ / nga yi mdun du 'dug nas su// khyod kyis 'di 'dra'i mchod byas pa/ gang gA'i bye ma ji snyed pa// de skyed mchod pa dag gis mchod// rin chen dra ba can gyi phyir// mdo sde bshad pa sus rig pa// byang chub las ni
166b8: mi ldog ste/ / sangs rgyas smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur// gang zhig mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa'i// bsod nams phung po'i tshad dag ni// 'di snyed sogs par 'gyur ro zhes// de ltar bshad par mi nus so// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sa
167a1: dang chu/ me dang rlung gi tshad dag ni// 'di tsam zhes ni bshad par nus// bsod nams phung po bshad mi nus// dge slong dang ni dge slong ma// dge snyen 'am ni dge bsnyen ma// gang gis mdo sde 'di thos pa// lha dang kU/
167a2: rang lto 'phye che// sems can thams cad nyer lpags pas// de yi gzi brjid mi bzod de// me ni gsil bar 'gyur zid kyi// de yi gzi brjid nyams pa med/ mdo sde 'di ni gang 'dzin pa/ byang chub spyad pa stod pa'i tshe/ semam can
167a3: gyis bsten bya zhing / / byang chub sems la'ang mchod pa byed// gang zhig stobs dang ldan pa'i mis// bye ba stong du bshags pa yi// rtses stong gi 'jig rten khams// bskal pa bye bar bzung ba pas// gang zhig phyi ma'i dus dag tu
167a4: sangs rgyas byang chub gleng bzhi ni/ / 'di 'dra'i rnam pas thos nas su// gzhan dag la yang ston byed na// gang zhig sngar ni rab bsgrags pa// 'di yi ngo mtshar chen po yi// brgya dang grangs dang bgrang ba dang // dper yang 'gyur ba ma
167a5: yin no/ / phye ma yis ni dus dag tu// 'di 'dra'i rnam pa seng ge'i sgra// bstan pa bla med thos gyur kyang // 'gal med don med 'gyur bar 'od// 'jig rten mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'od mdzad gang gis 'dir mthong ba// phyi ma'i
167a6: dus sa des thos nas/ / zhes gus par byed par 'gyur// gal te zhing rnams bye ba na// sems can gang dag 'khod de dag/ sangs rgyas ye shes ldan gyur la// gang gI yi ni bye ma snyed// bskal pa du ma brgya dag tu// rim gro dag ni byed
167a7: pa dang / / ji ltar stong chen gyi ni 'jig rten khams// ji snyed dag gi gtsug lag khang mchog ni// dbul bya lha'i tsan dan dag las byas// lha'i gtsug lag khang mchog re re la'ang // bye ba phrag stong dag gi khang bzangs byas//
167a8: bye ba phrag stong dag gi khang bzangs kyang // dbul bya lha'i rin chen dag las byas// re re'i khri dag bshams nas rim gro pa// bye ba phrag brgya shin du tshangs par bkod// mkhas pas de ni rin chen dra bdag/ blangs nas de tshe khri re brgyan pa
167b1: rnams/ / gang gA'i bye snyed bskal pa bye ba brgyar// thub chen 'jig rten spyod pa bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas gcig la 'bul bya dbul ba dang // ji ltar gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed// yongs su mya ngan 'das kyi mchod rten
167b2: byas/ / ji ltar stong chen 'jig rten khams rnams su// sangs rgyas cig gi mchod rten byas pa ni// rin chen rang bzhin lha'i sgo stong ldan// shin du legs par srid pa'i rtse srid mtho// ji ltar gang gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi// gsu/
167b3: ni mchod rten gcig la 'bul bar byed// de tshe re re'i gdugs la mu tig gi/ rgyan phreng bye ba rnams kyang shin du bkram// ji ltar gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed// bye ba'i 'phan dang rin chen sna tshogs kyi// rgyal mtshan bye ba phrag brgya
167b4: gang hrI si/ bye snyed mchod rten dgal 'bul bar byed// snang ba mdzad pa thams cad mkhyen gcig gi/ mchod rten gcig la sel snyan bye bstod/ krob cing dgus pa'i min sa ya dag/ khya ba phrag stong chang po 'bral bar byed//
167b5: me tog gdugs brgya du ma mchod rten la 'bul ba// thub pa che la de 'dra'i mchod pa nyin gcig bzhin// gang gA'i bye snyed bskal pa stong du byed pa bas// gang zhig mdo sde 'di las tshigs bcad gcig thos nas// so mnyi
167b6: med cing 'dun pa skyed byed la/ / rgyal ba'i mtshan 'di dag kyang brjod byed na// de bas bsod nams 'di ni bla med mchog// mkhas pa ting nge 'dzin gyi me thos shing / tshul khrims skyon med mtshan 'di 'dzin pa dang / de bzhin/
167b7: sangs rgyas la ni mchod byed pa// des ni gang gA'i byi skad sangs rgyas mthong // thub chen rkang gnyis mchog blar de dag la// mchod pa dam pa 'ang yid kyis byas nas ni// rtag tu myos med chos kyang ston byed cing // bskal pa bye ba/
167b8: de ni mongs med 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon pos mdo mchog rgyal po 'di// ston pa'i tshe na gang gis sngon mthong ba/ rgyal ba mchog las 'di ni thos gyur nas/ bye ba'i dus su des na dga' bas 'dzin// dring phyi ma'i bum
168a1: pa mi 'dod ltad/ 'dod pa skyon na bzang bstod byed ci// mkhas pa sa 'thung zhes mang na dga' se// gas chos med dkon pa ston par byed/ sangs pa'i grong byung bachog tu gnas nas sa/ da
168a2: bshad tshe gang gis nga mthong zhing / / dra ba 'ding la mchod byed mthong ba ni// phyi ma'i dus su mdo mchog 'di 'dzin to// nga'i bu gang zhig rtag tu rjes 'brang zhing // byang chub zhi pa spyod mchog spyod pa na// sems can rnams ni rtag tu
168a3: 'dul byed pa/ / bye ma'i dus su ma dmachog 'di 'dzin to// sangs rgyas 'dren pa gzhal med dpag med kyi// spyad pa spyod chogang gis rim gro dang / de bzhin mchod pa mchog dag byas pa ni// de ni phyi dus rgyal mchog tshas 'dzin
168a4: to/ / gang zhig bskal pa bye bar tshad spyod cing // 'jig rten mtha' yas don ni sngar spyad pa// gang zhig phyi ma'i dus su mdo sde 'di// thos pa'i bsod nams grangs su 'gyur ma yin// sangs rgyas 'khrug med yang na tshe dpag med//
168a5: sangs rgyas gzhal med dpag med de dag 'dir// sems can snying po gang gis mthong 'dod pa// mdo sde 'dzes pa dpag med gzung bar gyis// tshe dpag med dang mi 'khrugs dri meda'od// seng ge dang ni tog dang de bzhin
168a6: du/ / gang zhig sangs rgyas de kun mthong 'dod pa// phyi ma'i dus su rgyal mchog chos zung shig/ sangs rgyas byams pa dang ni dri med 'od// bdag nyid chen po dang ni seng ge'i tog/ rab snang gtso bo de bzhin mthong 'dod pa/
168a7: de ni phyi dus rgyal mchog chos zung shig/ 'di 'dra'i mdo sde khyad par 'phags mchog dag/ rin chen dra ba can la nga yis bshad// phyi ma'i dus su de tshe khyod kyis ni// bag med gnas la 'dug par ma byed cing //
168a8: phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe ru gyur pa na// tshul khrims skyon med rtag tu bag byos dang // de nas khyod ni 'chi ba'i dus byas nas// rgyal ba 'od zer mtha' yas can gyi zhing // rin chen ldan zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten khams
168b1: steng gi 'jig rten khams su 'gro bar 'gyur/ / de nas khyod ni 'chi ba'i dus byas nas// myur ba nyid du sangs rgyas byams pa mthong // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / leng tsa byi gno//
168b2: nu rin chen dra ba can dang / byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bzhi bcu dang / dgra bcom pa bye ba phrag drug bcu dang / lha bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu rnams yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das
168b3: kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa rin chen dra ba can gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gang gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar b+ha dang / lo tsA ba ban de ye shes snying
168b4: pos bsgyur/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du// ad+ya dan tsan dra pa ri brid tsA nA ma ma hA yAn suH/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rin chen zla bas
168b5: zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ / thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la shA ri'i bu dang / mau 'gal
168b6: gyi bu chen po la sogs pa dge slong 'bum phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis kyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po rnams dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
168b7: dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chu ba sems dpa' sems pa' chen po 'jam dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
168b8: blo gros rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
169a1: khams gsum rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
169a2: sems dpa' chen po rin chen 'byung gnas dang / byang chub sepas dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' sdug de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri dang / lha'i bubye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag dang rgyal
169a3: po chen po bzhi dpa / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin g.yog 'khor lha'i bu 'bum phrag du ma dang / bcas pa dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa g.yog 'khor tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pa dang /
169a4: klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po a la'i mad pa dang / klu'i rgyal po kun du grags dang / de dag las sogs pa klu 'bum phrag dum dang / gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon chen po 'brog gas
169a5: dang / / bab spu can dang / rtsi sprin dang / bod bu dang / de dag la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe// shams thabs dang
169a6: chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms la gshegs so// de'i tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i sras khye'u rin chen zla ba zhes bya ba glang po che lhag brgyad
169a7: pa zhes bya ba rin po che sna bdun gyi sa brgyan cing gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa/ dril bu g.yer kha sbyangs pa/ gser gyis spras pa'i dang gyi lnga sde mang pos mdzes par byas pa/ bdug pas bdugs pa/ me tog sil mas
169a8: gtor ba/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan sgreng ba/ gdugs dang rabs brgyan pa/ rin po che'i shing ljon pas mdzes par byas pa/ stegs bu bdun gyis kho ra khor yug nas bskor ba la zhon nas rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po
169b1: dang / / rgyal pa'i mthu chen po dang ldan pas rgyal ba'i khab kyi grong khyar chen po nas byung te/ sems can thams cad la sbyin pa dag sbyin 'angs rab las/ gzhon nu rin can thabs thag ring po zhig nas
169b2: bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa/ dad par bya ba/ dbang po dul ba/ thugs dul ba/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ dul ba dang zhi ba'i mchog/ dul ba dang zhi ba dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/
169b3: gtso bo chen po// dbang po bsrungs pa/ dbang po thul ba/ mtsho ltar dngos zhing gsal la rnyog pa med pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mda' ba/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus
169b4: brgyan pa'i sku gser gyi mchod sngo ltar 'phags la dpal gyi mchog gis lam me/ lhan lha de ste gshegs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang sems dad par gyur to// sems dad par gyur nas/ glang po che'i stong nas skyon
169b5: par zabs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// bcom ldan 'das la
169b6: zhe sa dang bcas/ / gus pa dang bcas pas phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i sras khye'u rin chen zla bas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyang ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la
169b7: 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can gang dad pa can gang dag gis phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu po dag
169b8: gis mtshan thos pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur 'di lta bu bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ / bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / cos
170a1: ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i sras khye'u rin chen zlab la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / gzhon du legs so lags so// gnon nu khyod 'di ltar rgya ba mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang ba
170a2: la bde ba'i phyir dang 'jig rten la snying rtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs phal po che'i don dang / lha dang / mi rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang / da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
170a3: rnams yongs su bzung ba'i phyir zhugs te/ gzhon nu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di zhu bar sems pa legs so// gzhon nu khyod kyi zhu ba bzang ste spobs pa dge'o// de'i
170a4: phyir gnon nu khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/ / sems rtse gcig tu rna blags te sems sdus la soms shig dang / don de ngas khyod la bshad do// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i sras bye'u rin
170a5: chen zla bas bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la de skad ces bka' stsal to// gzhon nu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing
170a6: bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyag/ gzhal du med pa snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba zhig yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba de sangs rgyas kyi zhing
170a7: dpag tu med pa ji snyed cig 'das pan yod ce na/ zhon nu dper na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du byems yongs su gang bar 'gyur la/ de nas mi la la zhig gis bye ma de las 'bru
170a8: r e re nas blangs shing shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rere bye ma 'brur 'jog par byed pa de lta bu'i tshul gyis byem de thams cad shar phyogs su yongs su zad cing yongs su gtugs par gyur kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngo
170b1: dag chad dam mtha' rtogs par mi nus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa de snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba de yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams de yang lag
170b2: mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis legs par brgyan pa/ gser gyis gzhir 'dug cing / mig mangs ris su bris pa/ rin po che'i shing ljon pas brgyan pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro skye gnas dang /
170b3: yi dgas dang / lha ma yin gyi tshogs rnams med pa/ rtswa dang / shing skam dang / tsher ma dang / rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo dag med pa/ dam grog dang g.yang sa med pa/ me tog sil ma dag bkram pa yin te/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
170b4: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal bzang po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs zhing 'tshe la gzhes te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor cing / byang chub sems dpas mdun gyis bltas pa/ rig pa
170b5: dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul ba'i kha lo skur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis
170b6: brgyan pa'i sku/ gser legs par bcos shing legs par dul ba lta bu rin po che'i brgyan legs par dkod pa bzhin du 'khor gyi nang na mdzes par bzhugs shing / thog mar dge ba bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba'i chos ston
170b7: to/ / 'di skad ces kyang ston te/ 'di ltar sa'i khams ni med par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs pa dang / gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
170b8: dang / / rnam par shes pa med par mi 'gyur ro zhes ston to// gzhon nu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal bzang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
171a1: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ni bskal pa bye ba phrag drug bcu lon lo/ / gzhon nu gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi nang dan nyan ma dang mtshan pa'i ming yang med de/ dzam bu'i gling gi bci ba3/
171a2: thabs 'dis dbyer bya ba ni ma gtogs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad kyang rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'od kyis snang bar 'dug go// gzhan nu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa des chos bstan pa
171a3: sems can khrag khrig phrag 'bum dpag tu med pa dag mi skye ba'i chos la mgod par mdzad do/ / bzod pa dang po dang / bzod pa gnyis pa dang / gzod pa gsum pa la ni de'i nyis zur 'god par mdzad do// no na nan /
171a4: bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs bskyed pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag na gang dag sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag par bya ba byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba
171a5: bskyed pa'i sems can dag gi lus la 'od kyis reg pa de dag kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob bo/ / gzhon nu gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo yang rung de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
171a6: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal bzang po de'i mtshan thos na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// gzhon nu 'di nas lho phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig
171a7: 'bum phrag grangs med pa snga ma ji snyed pa de snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ lag mthil ltar mnyam pa zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
171a8: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan dan dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te/ byang chub sems dpas bskor cing byang chub sems dpas mdun gyis bltas pa la thog mar dge ba/
171b1: bar du dag pa/ tha mar dge ba'i chos ston to// zhes bya ba nas rnam par shes pa med par mi 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i bar du sngam bzhin du byung ro// gzhon nu da la ji snyam du sems/ ci' byar da bzhin gshegs pa de can dan
171b2: dpal zhes bya zhe na/ gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad tsan dan gyi khang pa brtsegs pas yongs su khyab pas na de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan tsan dan dpal zhes bya'o// zhan
171b3: yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo yang rung de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i mtshan thos na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro//
171b4: gzhon nu 'di nas nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa snga ma ji snyed pa de snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams bzang po zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa
171b5: zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ ji ltar gong du bstan pa bzhin no// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas shes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tshol ba zhes te/
171b6: byang chub sems dpas yongs su bskor cing / byang chub sems dpas mdun gyis bltas pa la thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba'i chos ston to// 'di skad ces kyang chos ston to// zhes bya ba nas rnam par
171b7: shes pa med par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/ / gzhon nu gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo yang rung de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
171b8: rgyas de'i mtshan thos na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing 'od de yang nyams su myong ngo / / gzhon nu 'di nas byang phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bus
172a1: phrag grangs med pa snga ma ji snyed pa de snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'khrug med ces bya ba zhig yod de/ lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa zhes bya ba nas thams cad snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de na de
172a2: bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog gi dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tshol gzhes te/ byang chub sems dpas yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpas mdun gyis bltas
172a3: pal chos ston to/ / zhes bya nas rnam par shes pa med par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// gzhon nu gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo yang rung de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
172a4: pa'i sangs rgyas de'i mtshan thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyal mtshan lta bur 'gyur ro/ / gzhon nu 'di nas shar lho'i phyogs
172a5: mtshams su sangs rgyas kyang bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa de snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba snang ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ lag mthil ltar mnyam pa zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// bzhon nu
172a6: de la ji snyam du sems/ ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba snang ba zhes bya zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pas na/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams da zla ba snang
172a7: ba zhes bya'o/ / de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te/ byang chub sems dpas yongs su bskor cing
172a8: byang chub sems dpas mdun gyis bltas pa la chos ston to zhes bya ba nas rnam par shes pa med par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/ / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo yang rung / de'i mtshan
172b1: thos na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ / gzhon nu 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa de snyed
172b2: 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de na de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
172b3: chas rin po che'i mchod sdong zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tshal gzhes te/ byang chub sems dpas yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpa' mdun gyis bltas pa la chos ston to// zhes bya ba nas rnam par shes pa med
172b4: bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i ba du sngam bzhin du sbyar ro/ / rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo yang dung de'i mtshan pos na than med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing 'jig rten na nas
172b5: tshester mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro/ / gzhon nu 'di nas napa byang gi phyogs ma tshas rgyasangs rgyas kyi ning bye ba khrag cig 'jam thag grangs med pa de snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sgra ldan zhes bya ba zhig sod de/
172b6: lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa zhes bya ba nas sngam bzhin du sbyar ro// zhon nu de la ji snyam du sems ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de sgra dang ldan zhes bya zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi mas de sgra 'di lta bu dang ldan ste/ 'di
172b7: lha ste/ / sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sladag / stong pa nyid kyi sgra dang / mtshan ma med pa'i sgra dang / smon pa med pa'i sa dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang /
172b8: shes rab kyi sgra dang / rnam par grol ba'i sgra dang / rnam par grol ba ye shes gzigs pa'i sgra rnams dang ldan no// zhon nu 'jig rten gyi khams de sbal bu dag dang ldan pas na de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de spa dang
173a1: lan zhes byang/ dan bzhi/ gshegs pa tha sa pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ga la zhes kya gang brnanas ga laganas/ nga chu sams dpas pan rba
173a2: sems dpas mdun gyis bltas pa la chos ston to/ / zhes bya ba nas rnam par shes pa med par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du myang ngo // rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo yang drung de'i mtshan rdzas na blan med pa
173a3: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing me tog skar mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyis ma dgos par mi 'gyur ro/ / gzhon nu 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba thag
173a4: khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa de snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ldan zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang zhing lag mthil ltar
173a5: mnyam par gyur pa zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/ / de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par shes pa chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen pos rnam par rol pa zhes
173a6: bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te/ byang chub sems dpas bskor cing byang chub sems dpas mdun gyis bltas pa la chos ston to// zhes bya ba nas rnam par shes pa med par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas
173a7: snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/ / rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo yang rung / de'i mtshan thos na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang tshul thams cad la mkhas
173a8: shing pha rol du phyin pa'i shes pa yang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro gzhon nu/ 'di nas 'og gi phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa de snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yangs pa
173b1: dang ldan pa zhes bya ba zhig yod do/ / gzhon nu de la ji snyam du sems/ ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de yangs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams de lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa/ ri med cing khor yug dang / kho
173b2: yug chen po med de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ri zhes bya ba'i ming yang ye med pas na de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de yangs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
173b3: snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tshol gzhes te/ byang chub sems dpa' bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa' mdun gyis bltas pa la chos ston to// zhes bya ba nas rnam par shes pa med par mi 'gyur ro// zhes
173b4: bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/ / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo yang rung / de'i mtshan thos na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing nye bar len pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad
173b5: zad par yang rjes su 'dzin par 'gyuro/ / gzhon nu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas steng gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa gzhal du med pa de snyed 'das pa
173b6: na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba can zhes bya ba zhig yod do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba can zhes bya ba de sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa ji snyed cig 'das pa na yod ce na gzhon nu 'di lta ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
173b7: rten gyi khams 'di srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du bye mas yongs su gang bar gyur la/ de nas mi la la zhig gi bye ma de las 'bru re re nas blangs shing steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer bye ma 'bru re re 'jog par byed pa de lta bu'i
173b8: t shul gyis bye ma de thams cad steng gi phyogs su yongs su zad cing yongs su gdugs par gyur kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi tshad dam mtha' rtogs par mi nus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med
174a1: grangs med pa de skyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba can zhes bya ba de yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams de yang lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis legs par brgyan pa/ gser gyis
174a2: gzhir 'dug cing mig mangs ris su bris pa/ rin po che'i shing ljon pas legs par brgyan pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dus 'gror skye gnas dang / yi dgas dang lha ma yin gyi tshogs rnams med pa/ r+b+ba dang shing skam dang /
174a3: ma dang // rdo dang / gsagam dang rgya ma dag med pa/ ngam grog dang / g.yangs med pa/ me tog gis lam dag pa tham pa yin te/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor dpal zhes bya
174a4: da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te/ byang chub sems dpas bskor cing byang chub sems dpa' ma dran gyis ltas pa/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i khagro
174a5: skur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i sku gser legs par bcos shing legs par dul ba lta bu/ rin po che'i rgyan
174a6: legs par bkod pa bzhin du 'khor gyi nang na mdzes par bzhugs shing / thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ga tha mar dge ba'i chos ston to// 'di skad ces kyang ston te/ 'di ltar sa'i khams med par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du
174a7: chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang rlung gi khams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs pa dang / gzugs dang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med par mi 'gyur ro zhes ston to// rigs kyi bu 'am rags kyi
174a8: bu mo yang rung de'i mtshan thos na bla na med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing chos rin po che bla na med pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/ / gzhon nu de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu ma
174b1: yang rung de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyod pa dang / yon tanaldan sum tshogs pa dang / ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dang / tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par
174b2: grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pad dag gi mtshan thos na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// gnon nu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus
174b3: bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa yun ring po tshad med pa 'das pa de'im rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i bskal pa zhig byung ste/ der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
174b4: sangs rgyas rig pa dang nabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho'i dpal zhes bya ba zhig
174b5: 'jig rten du byung ste/ der de bzhi gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu po 'di dag thams cad lhan cig tu 'thun par dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed de/ zas dang / skom dang / bza' ba dang / bca' ba rnams
174b6: pa sna tshogs dang / me tog dang / spos dang / me tog phreng ba dang / brug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi rnam pa dpag tu med grangs med pas bcom ldan 'das de la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas thams cad kyis
174b7: lhan cig tu 'thun par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ thams cad kyis nyi ma gcig tu skad gcig thang cig yung tsam gcig la mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te// de nas de dag gis
174b8: rim gyis byang chub sems dpa'i myong ba spyad nas/ byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ skad cig yud tsam gcig la rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su bla na med pa yang dag
175a1: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la de dag gis chos kyi 'khor lo bkar ro// thams cad kyi tshe tshad kyang mnyam mo// gzhon nu de bzhin
175a2: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyang nyi ma gcig tu skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan
175a3: 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i zas khye'u rin chen zla zas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi sku tshe'i tshad ni ngo mtshar lags
175a4: te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis ni sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i slad du su tshe'i tshad de tsam du ring ba gzhes lags so// com ldan 'das gzhan yang gis kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang de zhin gshegs pa de
175a5: rnams kyi sku tshe'i tshad 'di la de bzhin du 'dzin cing yid ches la spong bar mi bgyid 'dor bar mi bgyid pa de la bsod nams ji tsam skye bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu stong gsum gyi stong
175a6: chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / de bzhin gshegs pa bcu po de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ci reg dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu po rnams lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang nas de bzhin gshegs
175a7: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la nyin cig bzhin du sbyin pa byin te/ de lta bur bskal pa grangs med par sbyin pa sbyin par byed la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis mtshan 'di
175a8: rnams dang / sku tshe'i tshad 'di rnams thos nas de bzhin du 'dzin cing yid ches la smod par mi byed smod par mi byed de/ mos par mi byed cing 'thun par byed na bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des bsod nams kyi brang po
175b1: de'i brgya 'char yang mi bod/ stong gi cha dang / dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod do// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po
175b2: dang / dpal ldan legs dang / dga' ldan dang / lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan gyis 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang / de bzhin gshegs pa bcu po de rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i
175b3: me tog dang / can dan gyi phye mas gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// tshig 'di skad ces kyang smras te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin
175b4: pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / brjod par bgyid pa de dag ni phyag bgyi ba'i 'os lags so// bcom ldan 'das tha na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dgagis sug pa na mchis pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par
175b5: rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gi rna lam du grag par 'gyur ba de dag ni bdud sdig can
175b6: gyi dbang du mchi bar mi 'gyur lags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i sras khye'u rin chen zla bas tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa// phung po med pa bcom ldan 'das// khyod
175b7: kyis legs gsungs dpag tu med/ / bdag dang lhar bcas 'jig rten rnams// khyod kyis 'di la yi rang ngo // 'jig rten mgon po 'das pa na// gang dag da dung ma byon dang // phyogs rnams ma lus gang bzhugs pa'i
175b8: sangs rgyas rnams la skyabs su mchi/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi yul gcig pa// chos dang dge 'dun zhi ba'i mchog/ yon tan legs pa bsam mi khyab// dge 'dun la yang skabs su mchi// byang chub sems dpa
176a1: 'jigs pa med/ / gang dag bzod la rab gnas shing // gang dag gzungs la gnas pa dang // gang dag mtshungs med kong nyid tshul// mtshan nyid kyi ni mdo sde dang // byang chub rgyur 'gyur sde snod dang / 'thun par
176a2: 'jug pa'i mdo sde la/ / legs skabs byang chub sems rnams ltar// thub pa bdag ni byang chub kyi// spyad pa spyod cing slob par 'tshal// rang byung de dag ji bzhin du// zhing gi bkod pa rnam dag dang // spyod dang spyod yul
176a3: ting 'dzin dang / / de dag gi ni yon tan dang // drang srong mchog rnams sku tshe'i tshad// gsungs pa gang lags rdzogs par bci// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de dag dang / rin chen zla ba gzhon nur gyur pa la
176a4: legs so zhes bya ba byin nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ / 'jig rten mgon po de rnams kyi// mtshan ni gang zhig 'dzin byed pa// ma 'ongs dus na de dag kun// rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog du 'gyur// da//
176a5: yis ji skad gsungs pa bzhin// drang srong mchog bzhugs de dag ltar// de dag tshe yang bskal pa ni// bye ba bsam yas rnyed du 'gyur// gang zhig skyob pa de dag gi/ mtshan 'di dag ni 'dzin de la// me dang chom rkun drug
176a6: rnams dang / / mtshon gyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// mtshan 'di dag ni 'dzin byed na// chu chen dag gis de mi 'chi// rgyal po'i gnod pas ma yin te// de ni nams kyang chos mi spong // mtshan mo thun tshong dang po/
176a7: dang // gung dang tha ma 'ang de bzhin te// dus gsum dag tu mtshan sgrogs dang // drang srong mchog ni de dag gi/ mtshan rnams snga dro sgrogs byed cing // nyi ma'i gung la spogs byed dang // mkhas pa nub kar sgrogs byed pa// rmi lam
176a8: bzang po mthong bar 'gyur/ / mtshan rnams bzung nas de'i 'og tu// bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su// sngon chad sdig pa ci bsags pa// mi dge thams cad bshags par bya// de yi lus ngag yid kyi las// mi dge gang dag byas
176b1: gyur na/ / mtshan rnams bzung nas de'i 'og tu// nye byas de yang bshags par bya// yan lag lnga yis gdugs nas ni// rgyal rnams byang chub sngon rol du// dus gsum dge bci bsags pa// de kun rjes su yi rang bya// 'jig rten
176b2: rtsalag rnams kyis ni/ / byang chub brnyes nas chos gsungs dang // lus can gang dag 'jig rten gyi// mgon po rnams la mchod byed pa// de la rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis// nyin mtshan dus gsum yi rang bya// des na bdag gzhan
176b3: don byed pa'i/ / pha rol phyin pa rdzogs par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i sras khye'u rin chen zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong de dag
176b4: dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yid rangs te/ mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa rin chen zla bas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mad dzags so//
176b5: rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud d+ha sid ha dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban de dge ba dpal gyis bsgyur// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid d+ha ka ra sI ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tshab ban de de ba tsan dras zhus te gtan la phab pa/
176b6: rgya gar skad tra/ Ar+ya shaM ka ra ba ri pri tsAn+da ma ma hA yAn sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bde byed kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' tham cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
176b7: skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i yul ser skya'i gnas na shAkya rnams kyi shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na dge slong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe
176b8: shAkya s+ya'i bu bde byed ces bya ba ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas phyung ste/ shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
177a1: 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ / de nas shAkya'i bu bde byed bcom ldan 'das ga/ la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub
177a2: sems dpa' chos du dang ldan na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ tshogs chung ngus kyang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis mngon par sgrub par bgyid// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
177a3: nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'chi bar bgyid/ rmongs pa ma mchis par 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par 'gyur/ skyes nas kyang mngon par shes la lnga dang ldan par 'gyur// mi khom pa thams cad rnam par spong zhing khom pa 'byor pa thob
177a4: par 'gyur/ gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur/ spobs pa thogs pa ma mchis pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos dang ldan zhing stong pa nyid la lhag par mos par yang 'gyur/ rtag tu rab tu 'byung ba la mngon par/
177a5: dga' bar 'gyur/ khyim na gnas kyang rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya'i bu bde byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu
177a6: khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su zhu bar sems pa ni rigs kyi bu khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che'i don dang / lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang /
177a7: bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin te/ legs so legs so// de'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ji skad smos pa'i yon tan dang
177a8: rjes su 'thob ste/ pa ni gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan zhing bzod pa la gnas pa de pha rol gshe yang slar mi gshe ba dang / brdegs kyang slar mi brdeg pa dang / mtshad brus kyang
177b1: slar mtshang mi 'dra ba dang / khros kyang slar mi khro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag ldanapa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing ji skad smras pa'i yon tan dran
177b2: sum tshogs pa yang rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas de bzhin du ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun du
177b3: smos kyang gshe bar mi byed la/ / gnod byas gzhan la de ni gnod mi byed// de ni mi lus spang ba byas nas kyang // byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan de dag 'thob// sdig pa'i tshig rnams rtag tu srung byed cing // sdig pa'i sems
177b4: kyi dbang du mi 'gro la/ / sdig las log ste 'bras bu de thob nas// ye shes mchog nyid myur du thob par 'gyur// skye bo gang dga' tshog rdung dga' byed cing // khro gtum gnod par sems dpa'i sems ldan rnams/
177b5: sangs rgyas ye shes yongs su spangs nas su// mi mkhas de dag sdug bsngal mi bzang ldan// de lta bas na gzhan la mi 'chog cing // rgyu dang mi rgyu rnams la dbyug pa spang // sems can kun la phan zhing snying brtser
177b6: ldan/ / des 'dir ye shes dam pa myur du 'thob// skye bo rmongs pa khros pas zil non pa// 'jig rten malas pa'i bstan las de ring ste// de ni log lha rnams kyis ngan 'dzin yin// de lta bas na mkhas mis dkrug mi
177b7: bya/ / byang chub sems dpa' gang 'dir mi khro zhing // bden pa rjes srung gzhan la mi gnod pa// spyad pa dkon pa de dag rdzogs byas nas// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mdzes phun sum tshogs// mi mkhas rtag tu phung zhing
177b8: sngang sems ldan/ / pha ma la yab 'di na gus mi byed// kun nas nyon mongs rtsa ba rab gnas pa// skyes bu tha ma'i nyes pa 'di rnams yin// de bas rtag tu bzod pa kho na rten// dge slong chos smra ba la bsten par bya// dge ba'i
178a1: bshes gnyen/ yongs su mi gtad ste// da la byang chub pacag ni dka' ba zang / rigs kyi brag nan yang byang chub sems dpa' tshas pan dang ldanan/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
178a2: phyir mi ldog cing ji skad smos pa'i yon tan mun sum tshogs pa yang rjes su 'thob bo/ / bzhi gang zhen/ rigs kyi bu 'di la chosadon du gnyer ba dang / chos 'dod pa dang / chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa dang / chos
178a3: 'dzin pa dang / chos ston pa yin/ bud med yongs su spong zhing bud med la snyan par mi byed pa yin/ sbyin pa'i bdag po dang / kun bgeng ba'i dang tshul can dang / kun bgad pa la dga' ba dang / rmugs pa dang / gnyid
178a4: yongs su spong ba yin/ stong pa nyid la mos pa dang / stong pa nyid la gnas pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi pa de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
178a5: phyir mi ldog cing ji skad smos pa'i yon tan de dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsus nas de bzhin du ston pas gzhan yang 'di
178a6: skad ces bka' stsal to/ / sems can gang dag chos ni 'dod pa dang / chos kyi don du brtson 'grus skyed pa dkon// gang dag chos kyi 'khor lo bskor byed pa// de dag ye shes dam pa thob par 'gyur// gzhan las thos nas
178a7: yang dag 'dzin byed cing / / pha rol don du gnyer la chos ston pa// shes ldan de dag 'khor du zhum pa med// bla med byang chub mchog la reg par 'gyur// log par ltung rgyu bud med rnam par spangs// rgyal sras rtag tu tshangs pa
178a8: spyod par 'gyur/ / tshangs par spyod la brtan par de gnas shing // 'khor lo bla med dam pa bskor bar byed// bud med rnams la mtshan ma 'ga' yod de// 'di ltar sdug bsngal nyams thag skem par 'gyur// de dag
178b1: bstan na zhi ba med pa ste/ / de bas yongs su spongs la byang chub spyong/ de nas shAkya'i bu ba byed bstan pa 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgul yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas rang gi/
178b2: lus las rgyan bkrol te// bcom ldan 'das gal bad logs su gtor to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus rgyan de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i drang thod kyi steng gi bar snang la rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs
178b3: ba zhig tu 'dug par gyur nas/ rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa de nas mi rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa lnga brgya byung nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyan rnam 'thor zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
178b4: chub tu yang sems bskyed nas tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bgyis te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
178b5: su bsngo bar bgyi'o zhes 'dzer to/ / de nas shAkya'i bu bde byed kyis kyang sprul pa'i mi de dag mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang lus kyi spu zing zhes byed par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
178b6: bcom ldan 'das mi 'di rnams gang nas mchis/ shar phyogs sam/ lho phyogs sam/ nub phyogs sam/ byang phyogs sam/ 'og gam/ steng gi phyogs sam// 'on te phyogs mtshams gang nas mchis//
178b7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu mi 'di rnams ni shar phyogs nas ma 'ongs/ lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams gang nas ma 'ongs te/ 'di rnams na
178b8: lha ma yin/ klu ma yin// gnod sbyin ma yin/ dri za ma yin// lha ma yin ma yin/ nam mkha' lding ma yin/ mi 'am ci ma yin// lto 'phye chen po ma yin/ mi ma yin/ mi ma yin pa ma yin no// sa'i khams la mi brten/ chu'i khams
179a1: lam brtan/ 'i khams lam nyan rlung gi sa brtan/ rnamam pa la khams la mnyan te/ di dag la na gzugs pad/ ba~M med/ 'drags dang / 'du byed rnams dang / sems med/ yid med/ rnam pacwa
179a2: shes pa med/ las med/ las kyi rnam par smin pa med/ 'jig rten 'di med/ 'jig rten pha rol med/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med/ gnas pa med/ 'chi 'pho med/ skye ba med do// 'on kyang rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni sprul pa zhes bya ba yin
179a3: no/ / 'di dag ni gzhi med pa zhes bya ba yin no// 'di dag ni srog med pa zhes bya ba yin no// 'di dag ni skyes bu med pa zhes bya ba yin no// 'di dag ni gang zag med pa zhes bya ba yin no// 'di dag ni mtshan nyid med pa zhes bya ba yin
179a4: no/ / 'di dag ni dben pa zhes bya ba yin no// 'di dag ni stong pa zhes bya ba yin no// 'di dag ni ngo bo nyid med pa zhes bya ba yin no// bde byed rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang dag de ltar chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur 'dod
179a5: pa dang / bzod pa dang / khong du chud pa dang / mngon par dad pa dang / yid ches pa dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par gyur pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bde byed nga'i bu zhes bya'o// de'i rjes su skyes pa zhes bya'o//
179a6: snang ba 'dzin pa zhes bya'o// 'od byed pa zhes bya'o// mun pa bsal ba zhes bya'o// nyon mongs pa spang ba zhes bya'o// ston pa zhes bya'o// bsod nams kyi zhing zhes bya'o// yon tan gyi gnas zhes bya'o// dge sbyong zhes bya'o//
179a7: bram ze zhes bya'o// tshor ba po zhes bya'o// glang po zhes bya'o// mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// phyir mi ldog pa'i chos
179a8: dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// lung bstan pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu gang su yang rung ba dag de ltar chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur mi 'dod/ mi bzod/ mi 'jug/ mi mos
179b1: mi dang / thos nas kyang dngang zhing skrag la dngang bar 'gyur ba dang / slar zlog pa dang / phyir gshe ba'i rigs kyi bu de dag ni dge sbyong ma yin pa zhes bya'o// ma ze ma yin pa zhes bya'o// mu stegs can zhes bya'o// dmigs pa can zhes bya'o// gas
179b2: ma pa zhes bya'o/ / sdig pa'i grogs po zhes bya'o// yongs su spang bar bya ba zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' ngan g.yo can zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'chal pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' ltar
179b3: bcos pa zhes bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sred lta bu zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sun 'byin pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gtum pa zhes bya'o// de nas bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
179b4: der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pas sems can ji snyed cig gi don mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdig can chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pas
179b5: 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu brgyad khri bzhi stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob po// dge slong lnga brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong ma bdun bcu rtsa lngas kyang mi skye ba'i
179b6: chos la bzod pa thob po/ / byang chub sems dpa' bde byed dang / dge bsnyen lnga brgya gzhan dag kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob po// dge bsnyen ma nyi shu rtsa lnga yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing / dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag ste/
179b7: de dag thams cad kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang ldan par gyur to// de dag thams cad kyang 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig
179b8: rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / der skyes nas thams cad lhan cig 'thun par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'dzin par 'gyur/ brjod par 'gyur/ ston par 'gyur/ yang dag
180a1: par rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/ / de dag phyis gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal pa 'das nas bskal pa bzang po zhes bya ba 'di nyid la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
180a2: byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la 'gyod cing mchi mas sangs la dra bzhin du gyur te/ de nyid nas phyir 'gro zhing tshig 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam
180a3: grangs 'di slad chad mi bshad du gsol/ zhes smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sdig can khyod de skad ma smra shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba 'di ni thogs
180a4: ma med pa yin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ ji ltar gzung bar bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'
180a5: ba de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnamathangs 'di byang chub sems dpa' ngas par 'byung ba zhes bya bar zung shig/ bde byed kyi zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zu shig/ kun dga' bongs chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod la gta de bzung ba dang / klog pa dang / bshad pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher/
180a6: yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir yongs su gtad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'i/ rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang gis shes rabagyis pha rol tu phyin pa ma gtogs par pha rol tu
180a7: phyin pa lnga po dag la bskal pa bcur spyad pa pas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston
180a8: pa dang / za na glegs bam du byas te/ 'chang pa de ni de bsod nams ches mang du bskyed pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang zhig tshul 'di ma thos par// bskal pa bcur ni
180b1: sbyin byin yang / blan med pa'i sbyin pa zhes// de ni gas par mi 'gyur ro// gang shig bskal pa bcurnams sa// 'jig rten pa yi tshul khrims bsrung// de ni dmigs la gnas bas na// rdul khrims de ni dag pa brang/ gshinapa ma
180b2: kyis bsngags pa'i/ / mdo sde zab mo 'di 'dzin pa// tshul khrims de ni blan med// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa yin// gangar ding bskal pa bcu rnams su// bzod pa smra ba'i mir gyur la// gshe bar byed pa'i srog chags rnams//
180b3: kun la bzod par byed gyur kyar// 'di na tshul 'di ma thos na// bzod pa de ni bsngags ma yin// gang zhig mdo sde 'di 'dzin cing // gzhan dag la yang rab ston na// bzod pa de ni blan med// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa yin//
180b4: gang zhig tshul 'di ma thos par// bskal pa dag ni bcu rnams su// 'chag pa dag las mi 'da' yang // brtson 'grus de'i bsngags ma yin// gang zhig sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa// mdo sde zab mo 'di 'dzin na// brtson 'grus
180b5: de ni bla na med/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa yi// gang zhig bskal pa bcu rnams su// bas pa gtan ldan pa'i ming gyur la// bsam gtan ro mo 'di gnas na// bsam gtan pa zhes de mi brjod// nang dang phyi rol rnams la yang
180b6: rdul tsam chos kyang me rtog na/ / bsam gtan de ni blan med// da ni bsam gtan pa zhes bya// de ltar sbyin dang tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang ni brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan shes rab mnyam nyid kyis// de ni byang chub myur
180b7: 'thob 'gyur/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis des dacas bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / shAkya'i bu ba byed dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang mi dang ldam yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten mi
180b8: rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa bdade byed kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA pa ra ma dang / khwa chen gyi lotsa ma ban /
181a1: seshes snga la sngags pas pashA cang sa ta gtan la rag // / thA shwA da / NaH rnas pa man na ba d+hA / ba g+sa rba/ Sh+ya sa phru / ts+tsho gis nas panas d+hA /
181a2: chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa rus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khaban gyi rgo phung po'i ril dge song stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong ga
